Reviews.Title: “The Yellow Rose”
Reviews.Author: rthirst
Reviews.Content: The location is great. The landscape is very nice. Everything is clean and nice. The food was good enough. The only real complaint I have about that is the dining room is very tiny. You may have to wait for you and your family to eat. It is very crowded. You can go outside to eat under the gazebos which are very nice. But there are smokers. I would like to see the smokers have a designated place to smoke. There are two gazebos and there were smokers in both of them. I liked our room. It was very clean. We had a refrigerator, and a microwave. We were given microwave popcorn upon check in which I thought was a nice touch. The one thing I didn't like about our room was the rooms open up from the outside. So if I wanted the curtain open to let the light in people could walk by and look right in our room. I will complain about the sheets. The sheets on our bed was ready for the trash. The sheets were rough, like little balls on them. Every morning when we woke up the fitted sheet had worked itself off the mattress. I do like a higher count sheet that is smooth and cool to the touch. Also elastic in good enough shape so the sheet stays on the bed. If that is not a problem for you then the bed will not be a problem. Other then that it was a great stay. The staff are very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “"Your Hotel search is over"”
Reviews.Author: MikeSalaty
Reviews.Content: What a fantastic hotel! This place is everything you have been reading about. We stayed here the week of Labor day. After staying here, I wouldn't even consider another hotel in the future. Just book this place! Spend your search effort and time on the shows to watch. Comfortable pillowtop beds, frig and microwave in room, 40" tv with over 60 cable channels. Very clean room with attention to detail. The A/C unit can be adjusted by degree so you will know the tempurature in the room. Nice quite area only 5-10 minutes from the main area of town. Pool looks nice, but didn't use it. Fantastic breakfast with eggs, biskets and gravy, waffles, 4 cold cereals, oatmeal packets, donuts, white or wheat toast, bagels etc. The staff couldn't be more friendly and helpful. I lost my comb, no problem they will give you a free one at the desk, no need to buy one. Just a nice touch. A welcome kit and leaving packet. Are you kidding me! And all at a reasonable price. I would have to be picky to find flaws in the place. Like the shower head is about 6' up. If your taller you might have to duck down a little to wash your hair. See what I mean, picky. I have spent much more on hotels and havn't been nearly as happy. I booked this place because of all the great reviews on Trip Advisor. We are not wrong. I havn't been this happy with a hotel property in quite a while. Like I said, just book this place.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Place To Stay!!”
Reviews.Author: Mike P
Reviews.Content: My wife,daughter,mother& I stayed for 5 days the first week of Sept. We all enjoyed our stay immensely. The rooms were very clean as well as the entire hotel. The beds were extremely comfortable & all the amenities were great! Location is good as it is not on the busy highway so it's nice & quiet but yet close enough to the places you want to go. Breakfast was very good & all the staff we met were extremely friendly & accommodating. Only complaint was the door to the rooms were really hard to open & close but I suspect it was probably due to the extreme heat & humidity. Overall it is a great place to stay & we would definitely stay again & recommend anyone else to stay their as well. Thanks again to the friendly staff for making our stay so enjoyable!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Good Times”
Reviews.Author: greco30
Reviews.Content: I never had a better time anywhere I have gone on vacation. The owner and workers were friendly as if we were family. The rooms are clean and beautiful and include a microwave oven and a refridgerator and wi-fi. It is about one mile off the main strip. If you plan a trip to Branson you will enhance your vacation experience by staying at the Yellow Rose Inn. Tony New Port Richey, Fl.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place To Stay!”
Reviews.Author: D R
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed around two weeks the latter part of Aug to early Sep 2012. We enjoyed this stay very much. The hotel is clean and our room was very nice. Appeared lots of renovations had been done. Breakfast was very good. Location is great! It is not on the busy Hwy 76, but so close and easy to get to places of interest! Our view was so nice. The service was very good; nice, friendly, and helpful people to deal with. We enjoyed it and would love to stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Slept like a baby!”
Reviews.Author: rescue2823
Reviews.Content: This place is great. The reviews on here speak the truth. They staff was very accommodating to our situation. The beds are soft and clean. The fridge and microwave was an added suprise. Do not let the price scare you away you will not be upset

Reviews.Title: “Clean, well kept, affordable, and quiet hotel worth repeat stays”
Reviews.Author: Tripcg
Reviews.Content: Booked this based on reviews. Does not disappoint. If you want a clean and well maintained place to stay in Branson, I highly recommend. If you are looking for a five star hotel, keep looking. This is not luxury. But don't let that fool you. Did I mention clean? My number one priority. Also a very comfortable bed, good water pressure, plenty of towels, solid wi-fi, big TV, nice pool, friendly employees... Frankly, I would stay here again. We like to come to Branson to shop annually and will likely stay here again as long as the rates stay reasonable. I certainly recommend this hotel. The only reason the room did not get a 5 was that there is no closet. Picky reason, I know, and an issue that would not prevent me from staying again gladly! But I just couldn't give a five. Now I feel guilty because I really do like this place. My favorite in Branson so far.

Reviews.Title: “Great spot.”
Reviews.Author: Terryryan
Reviews.Content: Very conveniently located. Efficient staff, CLEAN, nice room. We had a single king, poolside. Room was a little on the small side, but absolutely nothing wrong with it at all. We would definitely stay here again. Everything was perfectly in place, and had all the amenities. Nice looking pool(we have yet to get in it.). Very satisfied. Would highly recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Nice and quiet”
Reviews.Author: 61tammyh
Reviews.Content: This is the second time my son and I stayed at this hotel. It is one of the cleanest hotels we've stayed at and the staff is great! The price is awesome and the area is quiet and away from the main hub traffic. The pool area is clean and has lots of gathering spots around it. Definitely recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome! Nice and quiet!”
Reviews.Author: hopkinsh1978
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed here over the Labor day weekend, loved it!! Nice, clean, and quiet! Cheaper than other hotels and twice as nice! Extremely convenient! The beds were extemely comfortable, slept like a rock... We will be staying here from now on!

Reviews.Title: “a hidden jewel”
Reviews.Author: guynstjo
Reviews.Content: this was our second time to stay here and we are coming back over the thanksgiving weekend.the rooms are very-very clean and the front desk staff are all so kind and helpful on how to find places.the morning breakfast is good and hot--good variety--nice girls with a good morning welcome.

Reviews.Title: “Military Viet Nam vets get together”
Reviews.Author: Mark D
Reviews.Content: We had a room with 2 queen beds, everything was great. All the staff was pleasant and helpful, rooms and pool were clean. We stayed there the year before and it all was the same. I'm sure we will all vote to stay there next year again. Very nice place to stay, and will stay there again on our next trip.

Reviews.Title: “Quiet and Clean”
Reviews.Author: n2scrapping
Reviews.Content: Nice quiet place off the strip. Easy access to all shows and restaurants. Room was clean, nice carpet and our suite had a nice couch. Bathroom little small. Good variety on free breakfast. This property is well maintained but the greatest feature is the staff! They are simply the best. They went out of their way to help us get great bargains on shows and to choose shows that appealed to us. Tickets were delivered to our hotel which made it super easy. Nice welcome gift and a departure gift. The breakfast was a nice variety including the every popular waffle irons. The eating area is crowded but there are two outdoor gazebos for overflow. The staff in the breakfast area was helpful and very friendly. All of the staff especially the front desk made a terrific impression on us.

Reviews.Title: “Not what I expected”
Reviews.Author: worldtraveler10057
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews I expected much more than we received. We stayed in a king suite and the only thing that separated this room from others was the fact it had a love seat. The bathroom was about 4ft by 6ft including the stool and shower. The sheets felt worn and breakfast was not what I expected either. There were no healthy choices for breakfast expect tropical fruit. After the first day I did not eat it. The door to the room opened directly to the outside and cool air escaped and let in warm air every time the door opened. We were also awakened by people locking and unlocking their cars. There must be better places to stay in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “A Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: Becky R
Reviews.Content: What a surprise! We stay in Branson several times a year but had never seen the Yellow Rose. Decided to try it after reading the reviews here on Trip Advisor and am so glad we did. Room was spotless and looked new. Fridge and microwave - spotless (and appreciated). The front desk clerks were very welcoming (loved the gift bags and departing gift). We will definitely make this our Branson place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Dont miss this place!”
Reviews.Author: paris694
Reviews.Content: If you want a quiet, clean, comfortable place to stay this is it. The free breakfast is wonderful and they are expanding the eating area during the off-season. There are several nice touches such as the gift bag when you check-in and large fluffy beach towels for use at the sparkling clean pool. There are even water toys for the kids! The fact that the owner truly cares about this property is very evident in so many ways they are hard to list! We have stayed here twice and will continue to return. The staff is the best we have ever seen, not only in friendliness...but in their professionalism. Just not enough room here to sing the praises of the Branson Yellow Rose! :)

Reviews.Title: “Gets Consistently High Marks”
Reviews.Author: Gay B
Reviews.Content: All is consistently good at The Yellow Rose. The staff is hospitable, the rooms are very clean and the breakfast is good. The pool is clean and clear. The hotel is maintained well. All expectations exceeded!

Reviews.Title: “Great Motel!”
Reviews.Author: kdmac48
Reviews.Content: This motel was EXTREMELY clean and comfortable. The rooms very tastefully decorated and beds very comfortable. The staff was very friendly and helpful! Breakfast was great, although the biscuits were terrible and many people didn't like them, the gravy was FABULOUS! Overall, our stay was wonderful and well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: “Family vacation”
Reviews.Author: Jeff Z
Reviews.Content: Overall a great place to stay at a very reasonable price. Nice comfortable beds. Friendly and helpful staff with getting you tickets for shows and attractions. The complimentary hot breakfast is a bonus! Eggs, waffles, biscuits and gravy, donuts, bagels, cereal. Big money saver for a family and the lady that runs the dining area is super awesome and friendly! Pool area was nice too. Tables with big umbrellas plus a couple of gazebos with shade for relaxing.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: OklahomaMissy
Reviews.Content: I've been going to Branson for almost 30 years, and this is my first time to stay at the Yellow Rose....actually didn't even know it was there. I decided since I've been using Trip Advisor to check out what it had to say about the hotels there and I found this gem! A gentlemen named Keith checked us in, he was very considerate and friendly. The place had very comfortable beds, room was immaculate, and we slept very well as it was very quiet. Will definitely choose this place again.

Reviews.Title: “three day stay”
Reviews.Author: archie i
Reviews.Content: my stay was pleasant great beds and service was good. They were very helpfull in getting tickets to local shows. The pool was very good but a little to cool for me. vending machine worked and ice machine was good.

Reviews.Title: “Already Impressed”
Reviews.Author: firewifeks
Reviews.Content: I have just booked a King Suite for our 5th anniversary at the end of Sept. based on the reviews, and am already impressed. I called the hotel directly to book and the gentleman I spoke with could not have been more helpful, well-spoken and gracious. I am really looking forward to getting to stay here and enjoying our first trip to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Will return”
Reviews.Author: 2caclown
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed our stay at the Yellow Rose. Quiet, great beds, enjoyed every bite of breakfast. We made reservations for 3 nites using coupons from MO Visitors Center. Due to a family emergency we had to leave a day early. Lady behind desk was compassionate and we had no hassles. She gave us a complete refund for the third nite and wished us well with our travels. We will recommend this to friends and will return another time.

Reviews.Title: “Impressed”
Reviews.Author: hpeachee
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Yellow Rose this past Thursday night as an added night to our original vacation plans at another resort. We chose Yellow Rose based on the reviews off of Tripadvisor and we were not disappointed! The rooms are small but very clean and the beds were super comfy! The continental breakfast was typical but the employees were very friendly and helpful. We will definitely stay again soon!

Reviews.Title: “very nice staff and very reasonable rates”
Reviews.Author: Rosemarie D
Reviews.Content: This is our 2nd time here. It was even nicer than the 1st time in July 2009. We went at the end of July this year for 4 days. Good location. Staff friendly, room clean, nice clean pool, very nice breakfasts, gift bag on arrival and thank you gift at departure were very nice incentives. Will definitely come back here again!

Reviews.Title: “Would stay again!”
Reviews.Author: Mailgirl618
Reviews.Content: We stayed here because it was rated #1 on TripAdvisor. While not a fancy hotel, it was very clean and neat. You could tell it had been updated recently. The grounds were clean and the building freshly painted. The staff was very friendly. The pool and the surrounding area were well taken care of. The carpet in the room looked new. I had no problem walking barefoot on it. The beds were soft and the comforters also looked new. It had a fridge, microwave, and a large flat screen t.v. The bathroom was very clean, even in the corners(it always amazes me how hotels very rarely clean the corners). The only complaint(very minor) I had about the room was the ironing board is located in the bathroom. This hotel is located a little ways from the 76 strip, which might be a problem for people wanting to walk places. I didn't mind because it meant no road noise. They did provide a complementary breakfast, not the best I've had, but again no complaints because it was free. The eating area was small, but again very clean and neat. I would recommend this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Very clean and friendly staff!”
Reviews.Author: Missy M
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here for a couple of nights for our anniversary and were very pleased! The staff were friendly and even gave us a gift bag on arrival and chocolates when we left! The room was very clean and the bed was comfortable. Overall, this was a very nice place to stay...especially for the price! We will be staying here again!

Reviews.Title: “Great place for being cheap!”
Reviews.Author: Sara M
Reviews.Content: So clean! Friendly staff! Nice pool. Great rooms with comfy beds! This place was perfect. The breakfast was great! Gravy and biscuits with scrambled eggs. Even their milk was chilled and delish! :) Not far from main strip at all. Also, the performers from the show, legend of kungfu run up the road right by the inn, pretty cool.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice!”
Reviews.Author: Dale S
Reviews.Content: We (My Mom and Aunt and Uncle) stayed August 13 and 14, 2012, at the Yellow Rose Inn and suites. The rooms were quite nice and very clean. The staff was friendly and very proud that they had just reached #1 status on trip advisor. I was impressed by their desire to remain #1. I believe the staff takes great care to ensure that every guest has a wonderful stay as we did. The area is very quiet, and while its location is not on 'the strip', distances to area attractions are not great. I recommend staying here! Our only thought: really no meat line on the morning buffet (scrambled eggs were great!). Dale S, High Ridge, MO.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Wonderful!!!”
Reviews.Author: Susan G
Reviews.Content: It is a wonderful and very CLEAN hotel! The rooms were very nice and the staff is A++++. The breakfast buffet was really good and it is run by a mom and daughter team. They were really nice people. This is the best place to stay in Branson for the money. Also, the location was great. You felt you were hidden away from all the noise but yet you were so close to everything. I highly recommend this place!!!

Reviews.Title: “Mini vacation”
Reviews.Author: alanna r
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at several motels in Branson and have never been happy. We really liked this hotel. It was so clean and nice! The beds were so comfortable that is very important to me! Everything about this place is great! Thank you very much and I will recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience!”
Reviews.Author: terryg56065
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Yellow Rose and had a great experience. Very clean and accommodating. Rooms were very nice and very, very clean. Customer service was great. Thank you Yellow Rose for making my stay in Branson wonderful!

Reviews.Title: “Nice quite location”
Reviews.Author: Eddie F
Reviews.Content: If you want a nice quite, off the main drag motel with friendly down home folks and an excellent breakfast, this is the place. There are a few turns and twist to get there, but it is well worth it. The rooms are very clean, the bed was soft, the people are friendly and the free full breakfast (not just a donut and a cup of coffee) was great. We will stay there again when we go back to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Recent Stay”
Reviews.Author: Pat T
Reviews.Content: Our 3 night stay at the Yellow Rose this past week was indeed a pleasure, starting with the friendly staff, goody bag, quiet & convenient location, very clean king room, and excellent breakfast as part of room cost. We wanted to use the pool but never could due to too many people in it when we were there, the only drawback. Would recommend the Yellow Rose to anyone. Visiting Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!!”
Reviews.Author: Joan S
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed everything about the Yellow Rose Inn, everyone was so welcoming and accomadating during our stay!! The staff was so nice, even when my mother got sick, they were all right there to help!! The rooms were extra clean, and roomy with everything you needed even to an ironing board!! The breakfast bar was wonderful, which even saved you money since you didn't have to go out to eat, and they had about anything you could want for breakfast!!! The rates were very reasonable, and being right off the main strip, it was so quiet, you slept like a baby!! Very good place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “A Very Pleasent and Enjoyable Stay”
Reviews.Author: EagleFl
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed everything at Yellow Rose during our stay en route to Kansas City. Considering the staff and all the amenities the Yellow Rose offered it had the feel of a Mom 'n Pop business. It's located in an area away from the main drag which was appreciated. The staff was quite friendly and we received a package of popcorn, shampoo etc. when we checked in. The room was very clean and had very comfortable beds and included a microwave and a small frig. An enjoyable breakfast was included in the package and offered waffles, eggs, biscuit/gravy, excellent coffee and fresh baked donuts. We received a gift of chocolates and a card asking that we share our experience in TripAdvisor!

Reviews.Title: “Mini vacation w/daughter and her family”
Reviews.Author: larry t
Reviews.Content: Had a terrific time in Branson. What makes it so good was the care we received at the Yellow Rose. Had no problem finding it. Grounds clean, all the help were nice and helpful. Rooms were fresh and colorful. Had problems in the past finding a place to stay that wasn't run down after checking in. This place was a gem of a find. Plenty of choices at the breakfast and staff was very helpful. We hadn't left yet and was telling friends back home at Lawrence, ks area that this was the place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to spend the night”
Reviews.Author: MOfunthanworking
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed a couple of weeks ago. The room was very clean. The bed was awesome. It had a flat screen tv (maybe around 40 inch), fridge and microwave. The microwave did have a bad smell, but we think it from being shut up after being cleaned. Not a big deal. The pool was nice other than the kids splashing around without parents. We were staying during the week so we caught another mid day swim when we were the only ones. I liked the location. Easy to get to from a couple of directions if you have a gps. The easiest way to get in is to turn at Sonic on hwy 165. I'd recommend it for $65 a night in a reg king room. As others have mentioned you get a goody bag (popcorn and sample soaps) when you check in and a small box of chocolates at check out. All employees were very friendly. The breakfast was okay other than the waffles. They were awesome. The lady working made waffles both mornings for my wife and took our plates when we were done eating. We were the only ones in to eat the first morning as we were there not long after 630. Not sure if the weekend would be different as there weren't too many staying during the week.

Reviews.Title: “Hidden Gem - Lots of Perks - GREAT Price”
Reviews.Author: spdblondie
Reviews.Content: I listened to the Trip Advisor group and as usual, they delivered! This place was GREAT! Clean, nice layout, wonderful customer service as well. I already knew the breakfast area was small, and it is, but they say they are enlarging it in the future - which will make this place 100% perfect. The two ladies working breakfast were super busy, but friendly. The grounds are spotless, the rooms seem noise proof (except for those that walk past your window talking). We never heard running water from another unit, no creaking floors, no loud parties overhead! I have stayed ALL over the world, and this bed was by far the most comfortable bed I have ever slept in. I wanted to sneak it out with me! So relaxing you won't want to get out of bed, if you like pillow top mattresses. We loved the goody bag when we arrived (extra toiletries & coupons). The small box of chocolates upon checkout was a nice added touch as well. The place is a bit hard to find, even with our GPS. We will be back! Thank you for your hospitality!

Reviews.Title: “Branson Vacation”
Reviews.Author: Lenny C
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed 3 nights in a king suite and we loved it. The room was very nice and comfortable. All of the employees were very kind and helpful. We will definetly be staying there again very soon. Thanks to all for a very enjoyable stay!!!

Reviews.Title: “Our family loved this hotel, we will be back!”
Reviews.Author: Trwheatley
Reviews.Content: We brought family with us, this is the first time we stayed here. We loved it here. It was clean and staff was great. We will definitely come back here to stay. The breakfast was good, the area was clean and staff was very helpful. The breakfast area needs to be larger. The gazebos were also nice.

Reviews.Title: “Super clean rooms!”
Reviews.Author: Carol L
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a 4 day stay in Branson last week. I choose this hotel because of the reviews I'd read on Trip Advisor. I wasn't disappointed. The rooms were very clean, smelled clean and beds very comfortable. Never heard anyone in the rooms on either side of us. I was really excited to find an affordable hotel and get these qualities for the price. The one minor thing was that there weren't more healthier choices for breakfast. I would have loved to see some yogurt and fresh fruit. It looked as it the fruit came from a can. However, those are just my personal breakfast choices. Would not keep me from staying there again! Got a welcome bag upon arrival and chocolates when we left, which were very nice. I would recommend this hotel to anyone headed to Branson. We will stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Great value for a great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: jensmith23
Reviews.Content: Took a chance and tried a non chain hotel and was very pleased!! All of the staff from the front desk to the breakfast dining room were all very friendly! Rooms were very clean and updated. Bed was very comfortable. Pool was great, landscaping very nice. Breakfast was good, waffles made to order, biscuits and gravy, Krispy Kreme donuts, my only suggestion would be maybe some fresh fruit or yogurt for anyone who wants a light breakfast. Definately would recommend this hotel and plan on going back in a few monthes!!

Reviews.Title: “Goodie bag is a nice touch!”
Reviews.Author: W-Flemish-Traveler
Reviews.Content: Immediately at check-in we received a goodie bag with some products and tasty popcorn to use in the microwave in the room. The room was spacious and nicely decorated. The breakfast in the morning was tasty and the ladies serving were very friendly. We enjoyed our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Don't let the low price fool you - it is a NICE budget hotel!”
Reviews.Author: golfgal65
Reviews.Content: I was concern when I booked cause the price was so low...and that normally means the quality will be, too. NOT the case at the Yellow Rose!! This is a budget hotel not upscale, but you can tell that someone really cares about this place. The outdoor hallways are swept clean, the parking lot is clean, the room was super CLEAN, the hotel staff are very nice. We had a large flat screen TV in our room and new bed covering with throw pillows. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for budget accomidations in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, quiet, great price!”
Reviews.Author: rfindley
Reviews.Content: We tried this hotel on a recent trip to Branson due to the great reviews on TripAdvisor. We normally go for pricier hotels so that we have a better chance of getting a clean, quiet room. So, given the low price at this hotel, I admit I had my doubts about how good the stay would be... but I'm happy to report that it was a really great experience! The interior of the rooms was great... clean look and smell, clean bathroom, *very* comfortable beds, surprisingly nice bed cover and pillows. And very quiet! We had a room full of teens next door, but didn't hear them at all during our 3-night stay. The loudest sound was the arrival of a tour bus every morning, but that wasn't bad at all. If we are ever in Branson again, we will *definitely* stay here again! My only negative (just personal taste, though) was the free breakfast. I give them credit for good variety of continental and hot breakfast items, and especially that it is included in the already low room price. But it just didn't do much for me. The scrambled eggs were kind of like Jello (too much filler??). Biscuits and gravy were okay, but could be more flavorful. After the first morning, we ate breakfast elsewhere. I do want to give credit to the gal that services the breakfast area though... she was working very hard to keep the place flowing smoothly.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel I've Found”
Reviews.Author: Becky D
Reviews.Content: We stayed here on a recommendation and are SO glad we did. We will stay here on all our future Branson visits. The Yellow Rose was the cleanest most friendly hotel I've ever been to and I'm an extremely picky guest! The staff was so friendly and you're greeted with a welcome bag when you check in and a box of chocolates when you check out. The breakfast was nice as well. The eating area was crowded so we just took our food back to our rooms on the trays provided. I'm so glad we found this hotel!! A huge thank you to the staff for working so hard to provide a clean, comfortable stay!!

Reviews.Title: “Our new favorite place to stay in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: zarkstl
Reviews.Content: We just completed a 4 day stay at the Yellow Rose and loved it. The entire hotel was very clean and well run. All of the staff was wonderful and went out of their way to make our stay a great experience. The beds were really amazing.......probably the nicest in any hotel we have stayed in. The pool was sparkling clean and just the right temperature. The staff did a fantastic job cleaning our room every day. They also had really nice beach towels at the front desk that you could get for the pool. I found the free breakfast to be very good and thought the girls did a great job considering how busy it was. We also loved the location which was off the busy strip but had easy access to everything. The 40" flat panel tvs in all rooms were also nice. I think the Yellow Rose is a bargain for what you pay and it will be our hotel of choice when we return to Branson for our next visit!

Reviews.Title: “A nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: 1966Airstream
Reviews.Content: We were very pleased with our stay at the Yellow Rose Inn in Branson, MO. The room was clean and nicely maintained and the rates were reasonable. The staff was very courteous during check in and called the room a few minutes later to be sure we were pleased and to see if there was anything we needed. The hot breakfast served each morning was very good and they seemed to always have plenty on hand. The only negative comment that I have is that the wifi didn't seem to reach my room with enough strength to use. I don't know if it was the hotel's wifi or my wireless device that was the problem, but I could only use the wifi if I walked closer to the office.

Reviews.Title: “Clean but breakfast was a joke”
Reviews.Author: Justanopinion123
Reviews.Content: The room was clean however not enough pillows. The problem for us was that on the internet the breakfast area looks awesome. It's advertised to start at 630. We get there to eat at 630 got our plates and got eggs, biscuits and gravy. The eggs were literally sitting in water when we put them on our plate. Went to eat and EVERYTHING we got was COLD. When we said something to the girls they said sorry we got here late and there's a microwave. No thanks. The food is literally warmed in crock pots and was not good. Really disappointing. Will not recommend and will not stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value”
Reviews.Author: MTapp
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with this inn especially for the price. The rooms and the entire property were very clean and the staff warm and welcoming. The ladies who ran the breakfast were a delight and my children looked forward to breakast every morning. Our requests for small things such as exta towels or a midday change of sheets were quickly and enthusiastically handled. Even though this was a family trip, I had to work a little bit while we were there. I was especially impressed that the wifi connection was quite reliable, fast and easy to connect to. There was even a desk where I could work. My kids loved the large flat screen TV and took full advantage of the pool. The on-site laundry room came in handy with a small child. A little pricey at $1.50 per wash or dry, but the machines were in good working order and the laundry room was super clean. I even had a mishap with a vending machine and maintence was on it within minutes. I always felt that our business and presences was very much appreciated. All the excellent reviews are true! You won't be sorry to book a room here. The Yellow Rose will be our place to stay the next time we visit Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: sharintexas
Reviews.Content: My family and I spent 2 nights at the Yellow Rose Inn and Suites while we were in Branson. Our rooms were clean, in fact the bathroom almost sparkled! The staff was pleasant and very knowledgeable about the area. The area was quiet, but the main tourist area was very accessible. The breakfast was good with plenty of choices and attentive staff. Would stay there again and recommend it highly.

Reviews.Title: “Best value we have found in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: charrell
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough about this hotel. When we arrived we loved the service at the desk! Then we went into our room and it was clean but smelled of smoke. It is a non-smoking hotel so we called the front desk. Within 5 minutes the manager arrived, validated our complaint, and gave us the key to another room just on the other side of the building. He was very apologetic. The pool was so clean, also! The girls loved it. The bathroom is tiny - so don't expect a lot of room in there. The bed was super comfy and loved the blankets and pillows! The TV is much larger than our's at home and the cable selection was very vast. We will stay here every time we visit Branson. Thanks so much!

Reviews.Title: “Clean and comfy with plenty of extra touches.”
Reviews.Author: TravelinMomma580
Reviews.Content: We had spent two nights at another hotel in Branson before deciding to give this place a try for our third and final night. This place is off the strip, down a nice, tree lined road, but still very close to all of the attractions. Check in was a breeze. The clerk was very pleasant and friendly, she quickly got us checked in and informed us of the information we needed to know about parking, the pool, breakfast, etc. We enjoyed our welcome bag, which contained samples of various items, such as shampoo and conditioner, deodorant, and popcorn... a nice little extra touch. Our room was extremely clean, the shower shined, and the smell was pleasant and refreshing. The beds were very comfortable, and included more pillows than one might expect to find on a motel bed, making for a great night of sleep. There was a refrigerator and a microwave in the room, we used both and they both worked fine. The tv was nice. We didn't hear any noise from other rooms, but we did hear an occasional stomp of a kid walking by outside, as we were on the pool floor (no biggie, I'm a mom). The pool and pool area was nice and clean, with plenty of room to sit or swim; and instead of regular pool towels, beach towels were available for checkout at the front desk. Breakfast included fruit, donuts, eggs, biscuits and gravy, a bread selection, cereal, waffles (which the staff offered to make for us), and beverages. We enjoyed our breakfast, and were pleased with the service, such as the help that we received clearing our table. Check out was easy, again, the staff was very friendly, and we enjoyed our box of chocolates that we received upon check out... another nice little extra touch. All in all, we had a great stay at the Yellow Rose, and we will likely stay here the next time we visit Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay”
Reviews.Author: Teresa O
Reviews.Content: Always look to fellow reviewers in deciding on a hotel. Was supicious of the low price so was constantly looking for something to be wrong. Was very pleased to be able to say that our stay was excellent. Very clean room and pool area. Even though room was right by the pool, after pool closing time it was very quiet. Breakfast had a great selection of items and everyone was very friendly. Would definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “SHH - BEST KEPT SECRET IN BRANSON”
Reviews.Author: cjjohnson4
Reviews.Content: I almost hate to let this secret out. If you have never stayed at the Branson Yellow Rose, one stay and you will keep coming back. It is not a luxury hotel but always VERY CLEAN, QUIET AND COMFORTABLE. Off the strip it is still conveniently located. Newer beds which are Very Comfortable. Nice pool close to rooms. Very reasonably priced. Best deal in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Cozy, quiet and very friendly. Starting your day with these folks will put a smile on your face .”
Reviews.Author: Toledobenders
Reviews.Content: Read many reviews before settling on the Yellow Rose. good choice, will stay here again. Everyone very friendly and the room was super comfy. We liked being off the strip. Atmosphere here felt like "family ". Great value .

Reviews.Title: “Branson Yellow Rose Inn & Suites”
Reviews.Author: ctl2
Reviews.Content: Attractively decortated and comfortable room. Super clean! Well kept pool and grounds. Lots of ammenities. Large assortment of very tasty breakfast items. Every staff member was extremely friendly, helpful, and made us feel at home.

Reviews.Title: “Nice for the price”
Reviews.Author: Commodore1
Reviews.Content: This owner apparently cares and takes pride in their property. We stayed one night - June 26th, 2012. I was not disappointed in the reviews. Bed was comfy, room was clean and A/C worked well. Room was a tiny bit small, but we weren't in the room that much. Enjoyed the pool area, and the flowers. We found the location to be ideal as its close enough, but tucked back in a residential area so its very quiet. Appreciated the little gift bags on welcome and exit. My chief complaint ( and that morning I was STEAMING MAD) would be the kitchen staff for breakfast. Although they were pleasant, they were extremely disorganized and arrived at work late. If you advertise opening at 6 am, then you should be ready to open at 6 am..not just arriving!! We literally had to stand at the door and wait on them to open it after watching a woman arrive at 6am. When we were finally let in..we were told we could at least get coffee ( nope..it wasnt done yet). I was told it had recently changed from 6:30 am. Sorry..no excuse ! They were worrying about doing things that could wait until last ( not prioritizing well)..and didnt turn on the gravy which clearly takes a long time to warm up when there is so much in the warmer. Its not sausage gravy ( no sausage)..its country gravy. My donut was stale...hard as a rock. By the time we left the room was full of people ALL waiting on something to eat! I think the breakfast area would be fine if it was organized better in layout and the staff were more organized. Sorry..but i think your Mom /daughter duo are hoodwinking you. They are friendly, but that is all I can find nice to say. We would come back, but just not plan on having any breakfast there. Before you spend a lot of money enlarging..you should try reorganizing the room..staff included.

Reviews.Title: “Love this hotel & will b back!!”
Reviews.Author: loveitorleaveit_76
Reviews.Content: The room was really clean & beds were very comfortable. Nice big flat screen tv. Friendly staff. Even called to make sure room was ok. Nice quiet location off strip, was a little hard to find tho. Breakfast was great.! Excellent price. Will return.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience!”
Reviews.Author: Jwkajohnson
Reviews.Content: Very friendly staff, clean rooms, and off the beaten path but very accessible to everything. We was able to do everything we wanted because it was located in a central location. Thanks for the wonderful stay.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: bishop35
Reviews.Content: We just returned from Branson and stayed three nights at the Branson Yellow Rose Inn and Suites. The location is great, away from all of the traffic and crowds. Everything looked very clean and new. The beds were very comfortable and actually missed the bed after I got home. Great shower, beautiful flat screen TV, small refrigerator, microwave, etc. We were always greeted with a smile and the welcome and departing gifts were very thoughtful. The breakfast area is small and I know that they are in the process of fixing that problem. The food was good but not fantastic. For the price and value I didnt expect the breakfast to be anything more than what it was. They had a great variety and we only waited a short time to get in. We will be returning to Branson in August and plan on staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Would definitely stay again”
Reviews.Author: Sarie98
Reviews.Content: Right off the strip but not on top of it. Room was very, very clean. Bed was super comfy and the pillows too. Flat screen TV was very nice. Pool was nice size and clean. I really can't say anything negative about this place...besides maybe some meat at the FREE breakfast (sausage or bacon please!). I would definitely stay here again if we decide to visit Branson again!

Reviews.Title: “Had a great time!”
Reviews.Author: Ricky B
Reviews.Content: Very friendly staff and clean motel. The front desk helped us find good deals with our stay in Branson. We were pleased with our stay.

Reviews.Title: “These people treat people like royalty!”
Reviews.Author: Xlucky7mx
Reviews.Content: I went out to eat and Leasure 2 times a day in my 4 day stay in Branson this time and the only time I was treated like anybody cared about me and my family personally was when I was at the motel especially at breakfast time the rest of the time I was away from the motel all of the other people working at the restaurants resorts and showes took for granted that they have an unlimited supply of customers bringing them in money. Not at the yellow rise inn. It does not have the best view and is not on the strip but when we go to Branson we will stay no where else!

Reviews.Title: “Family Vacation”
Reviews.Author: Tracey R
Reviews.Content: First time to stay in this hotel. Very clean. Rooms were very quiet with no noise. Only complaint was the breakfast area was very small and crowded. We stayed four nights and only ate breakfast there one time. Food was good. Just need a bigger area to accommodate guests. Would stay here again though.

Reviews.Title: “LIVED UP TO IT'S REVIEWS”
Reviews.Author: trapper-jj
Reviews.Content: Can't say enough about the Yellow Rose even though room appeared a little dated. We have never seen a room so clean, even the bathroom. When we checked in we couldn't have felt more welcome. We even received a "welcome bag" (which was a nice surprise). The entire staff were all very pleasant, didn't see one person without a smile on their face. Loved the refrigerator in the room, which helped out because we had meds that needed to be kept cool. The microwave was nice to have in the room and the large TV had a great picture. Loved how the motel is situated and tucked away off the main drag, where it is quiet, but not too far away from anything. Didn't take long to get to the shopping or a place to eat. Breakfast was crowded sometimes, but good and I see that they are going to expand the area during the off season. We would not hesitate to stay here again. Thanks for making our stay very relaxing.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap and cheerful!”
Reviews.Author: Djknightga
Reviews.Content: Great value. Typical motel but very well maintained and clean. All the amenities one could need. Would stay here again. The staff is very helpful and the breakfast is great!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Linda K
Reviews.Content: This is a nice place to stay. The rooms are clean and bright. Love the fridge and microwave and the new TV. The air conditioning was not very good in our room but when we got back to our room they had replaced the unit. Thats service! We had two rooms overlooking the pool and the grandchildren enjoyed the pool. The breakfast was very good with plenty to choose from. The staff was friendly and helpful. We would defintely recommend this to anyone coming to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: Samantha M
Reviews.Content: It was well worth the stay the beds were comfy and the employees where all very friendly! The rooms were very clean. Definitely will stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: ArkansasRev
Reviews.Content: Very comfortable and well maintained. All the staff were extremely helpful and friendly. We would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Jason B
Reviews.Content: Motel is in a very quiet setting, nice rooms, and loved the mircrowave and fridge in the room. The motel staff was very friendly, and helpful. Will stay here again when in Brason. One small complaint is that is was 100+ degrees the four days we were there, and the pool was only open from 10am to 10pm. When you get back for a show at 9:30 or 10pm and it is still 90 degrees it would have been nice to use the pool. Overall this was a great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay at a great price.”
Reviews.Author: KANDKEVANS
Reviews.Content: For the money, you can't beat this hotel. Clean and comfortable. Great beds and a flat screen TV. It's off the main strip which is a good thing. Free breakfast is good and plentiful. The pool is a good size and sparkling clean. I highly recommend the Yellow Rose!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel and great location”
Reviews.Author: Marybeth128
Reviews.Content: This was our first trip to Branson and we found this hotel on Trip Advisor. We compared the reviews with other hotels in the area and settled on the Yellow Rose. We made the right decision! We were able to check in early. The front desk staff were friendly, helpful with our questions and gave us a welcome gift bag.The room was clean and well appointed. I appreciated having a refrigerator and microwave as we did use them during our stay. It was quiet and the surrounding area beautiful. I liked the fact that we were close to the main drag yet far enough away as not to be right in the middle of all of the traffic.There was a good selection for breakfast, but not for those who need healthier choices. The breakfast room is small, but there is an outdoor area to use during busier times. We will definitely be back to the Yellow Rose and will highly recomend it to friends and family!

Reviews.Title: “RAT RACE BREAKFAST...”
Reviews.Author: Tarusbull
Reviews.Content: Wow, stayed here for 4 days and the breakfast room was a" riot in motion". To small for the size of the number of hotel guests staying there, bossy employees working there don't help, they make it worse. I don't have the answer, but, be careful when going there for food! The pool wasn't maintained as should have been and the water was unfit for swimning, so, the health dept. shut it down and we couldn't use it. They tested the water and did their best to shock it back to safe conditions, but, we gave up on it after 1630. The location is very nice, alittle hard to find at first, but, the setting around the hotel, makes up for the weaken other amenities. The bathroom was small, but, had the proper equipment,so, that's all that matters. Also, the cost was very resonable. The staff was very friendly and always smiling, except the breakfast room workers and I guess under those conditions, I would not have been to friendly either? would drive me to drinking! The pool and dining room reduced my rating down to a 3, I could have easily given a 4 without those problems.

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful quiet place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: BarbLH
Reviews.Content: This was our first stay at the Yellow Rose, but it won't be our last. The front desk staff was friendly, checked us in early, and arranged for show tickets to be delivered to the hotel. The room was great, clean and everything was working properly. It was nice to have the sink outside the toilet/tub room. As others have mentioned, the breakfast area was small, but there was a lot of choices available, along with friendly staff. The location was about 2 miles from the 'strip' area, so it was perfect. We'll be recommending the Yellow Rose to anyone else visiting Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff!!”
Reviews.Author: Becky J
Reviews.Content: Loved the location of the hotel. Off the beaten path! Beautiful setting. The front desk staff is more than awesome!! So friendly and helpful. Got a welcome gift at check in and a going away gift when we returned our key cards!! Our room was very clean. But....it was not quiet. It was right by the stairs so we heard everyone stomping up and down them all hours of the day and night. Plus the maids supplies were right behind our room. Very noisey!! Im sure if you got a room in a diffferent location it would be much quieter. The pool was very nice and clean. Shower temperature did fluctuate and the toilet ran for awhile after flushing, but no big deal. We will stay here again,,,just in a different part of the hotel. Beds were very comfortable too!!

Reviews.Title: “A very nice family friendly place.”
Reviews.Author: FamilyTraveler66067
Reviews.Content: Clean and well maintained. friendly and helpful staff. Good hot continental breakfast (although the room is small and can get congested), there is nice outside dining available. A little off of the beaten path but easy to get to. Beacause it is a little bit off of the "strip" it is quiet and peaceful. Easy access from the back way via Fall River Road.

Reviews.Title: “Well managed by people who care”
Reviews.Author: Kenton H
Reviews.Content: We were very impressed with the management and care give to the details at this hotel. It is a great value.

Reviews.Title: “Nice motel”
Reviews.Author: fsark
Reviews.Content: Everything about this motel was very nice. The only complaint was the breakfast and breakfast area. It wasn't very good, and the area was very cramped. Other than that, great experience.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value!”
Reviews.Author: CBKansas
Reviews.Content: Great Value for what you get. Beds were super comfortable! Water pressure not that great and went from warm to cool to hot, but really expect that with such a busy tourist town like Branson. Pool was great just the right size for our child to enjoy. Breakfast was great just be prepared for it to be crowed, way to crowded. They really need to add on more space to seat, it is really cramped outside and inside. While you are trying to get your food you spend a lot of time trying to get through the busy mess of people. Room was clean just need to remember to check under bed skirt when they clean found random trash under it :( But overall great. would stay again in a heart beat. LOVE they are off the main road but not to far :)

Reviews.Title: “Nice place- Great price!”
Reviews.Author: Tikiboo100
Reviews.Content: Our family stayed at this property last weekend and loved it! Although it was a bit hard to find at first, our vacation was great! It kind of looks like a Motel 6 from the outside; however, the rooms are very nicely decorated with very comfortable beds. I would highly recommend this property to people looking for a nice, affordable property with Free Breakfast! It is not too far from the strip either! All the staff were accomodating and genuinely nice. This hotel gets 2 thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: “Great little hotel”
Reviews.Author: AmiD911
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Yellow Rose the week of July 2nd. The room was very clean and comfortable (great beds!) and the front desk staff was friendly and helpful. We requested a pool side room, which turned out to be kind of noisy each evening, but that was to be expected. What surprised us, was that it was cleared out and quiet every night by 10 - never had a problem with noise at night. The pool was also a great place to watch fireworks from on the 4th. Close to the strip, but not right on it. Our stay was perfect, we'll definitely be back!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: omadave64
Reviews.Content: Off the beaten path, but nor that far. Excellent service by hotel staff. Clean, neat well maintained. The pool is also fantastic.

Reviews.Title: “For the money, it was perfect.”
Reviews.Author: Jeff-Susan H
Reviews.Content: Off the strip but not too far that its a long drive back each night. The interiors have been updated and our unit was very clean. New furniture, beds (very comfy), flat panel tv's, fridge and micro, etc. Staff was friendly, Pool was fine as well. Cant comment on the complimentary breakfast as we never get up that early. This is an old school hotel, outside corridors, stairs, (new elevator available), but its well kept. We were a bit worried but #2 on the list of all hotels?? It was a perfect fit for the price paid. Its not the Hilton, those are $200 plus rooms, but its not the "2 for $30" never been updated '70's hotel on the original strip. Overall, very happy.

Reviews.Title: “One of My Favorites”
Reviews.Author: Rye A
Reviews.Content: I've stayed in many hotels in Branson, and this was one of my favorites. The staff was VERY friendly and the entire property was charming and well-maintained. Plus, you'll be hard pressed to find a better price.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised!”
Reviews.Author: MollyMKansasCity_KS
Reviews.Content: Staff was very friendly, the mother/daughter team at breakfast gave excellent service and were fun to be around. Rooms very clean. Beds very comfy. Great value! We would definitely stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Horrible Stay, won't be listening to these reviews again!”
Reviews.Author: tristin f
Reviews.Content: My husband and I read all these glowing reviews for the hotel, so since our normal one was booked over the weekend we decided we'd give it a try, It had great reviews so we thought it would be a great place to stay. Boy were we wrong! The only thing I can say that was good about our stay was the bed, it was very comfy. Let's start with the negative, the floor in the bathroom was full of hair when we checked in so I had to clean that up, which was kinda gross, there was a skunk smell in the room, we smelled it everyday, air freshener didn't help it, there must have been a skunk that lived outside the room somewhere. The wifi was just horrible, we couldn't get it to connect at all, I even called the front desk and they couldn't help nor move us to another room. The room furnishings weren't good either aside from the bed, their was a loan old chair in the room that had to be 20 plus years old, there was a desk chair that would have been comfy I suppose had it not been so worn down, just not good. Now let's talk about the pool, it was horrible, very very dirty, it needed a major scrub down, somebody needed to get the net in it and get the dead bugs out and other things floating in the water out. The water was beyond murky, so it defiantly wasn't something we could enjoy. This was our worst trip to branson in a long long time, we'll never stay here again and I'd recommend thinking strongly about it before you decide to book it. I called the front desk numerous times and nothing was done.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: mcbethie
Reviews.Content: Stayed At the Yellow Rose after sister recommended it. Normally stay at Comfort Inns, but this little hide away was perfect. Close to all the attractions but off the busy noisey HWY 76.. Pillowtop Mattresses, just like comfort of home. Clean room, very inviting and large nice tv. AC worked great in the July heat. Couldn't have wanted for anything else. Nice laundry room with 2 washers and 2 dryers and pool. Didn't have time for pool, but it looked inviting. Breakfast good, but somewhat cramped for space. My pick for Branson for a super comfy, quiet, and clean stay that lets you keep a little extra cash to do more....Even got a box of Chocolates when we checked out!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great experience!”
Reviews.Author: Karen K
Reviews.Content: We liked the Yellow Rose as it was a little out of the way, but still close to all shows, etc. There were good alternate routes to the downtown & show venues. Breakfast room was great and well organized. The guest laundry area was also clean and neat. We would definitely stay there again

Reviews.Title: “Nice, inexpensive motel”
Reviews.Author: slssls250
Reviews.Content: Stayed here over 4th of July week. Nice motel, away from the main drag. Traffic in Branson is crazy anyway & it was terribly hot that week. We had a room on ground level, right next to the pool. Had to pay $10 extra for this room, but was worth it. The kids loved the pool. Not a really big pool, but very well kept. Our room was a non smoking 2 Queen room. All rooms have a fridge & micro, which is a nice extra & a nice big flat screen tv with lots of channels. The room was very clean, even though this is an older motel. Looks like renovations were done not that long ago. The only complaint about the room would be the bathroom. The sink is outside the toilet/shower area, so therefore the toilet/shower area is very, very small. We tried the free breakfast on the first 2 days, but decided to go somewhere else for breakfast the rest of our stay. The breakfast area is way too small & crowded. Could have went outside to the gazebo but that is where people went to smoke(yuck!) The food they had at the breakfast could be a little better. There was no fresh fruit(just a banana would have been nice) & there was not yogurt, etc. The waffles were rubbery, but my husband said the biscuits & gravy were good. One more issue. We had a nonsmoking room, but every morning & some afternoons, people would sit outiside by the pool(outside of gate) & smoke. The smoke would come through the vents in the air conditioning & stink up our room. Not the motels fault though. If we come back to Branson in the future, would definatelty have no problem staying here again, especially of the price stays low.

Reviews.Title: “Not sure why highly rated”
Reviews.Author: KgageStLouis
Reviews.Content: We stayed here this weekend. The location is off the beaten track and not within walking distance of any Branson attractions. The outside of the building looked very old. The room was poorly decorated (ugly bedspread) but was very clean...new tile floor and tub surround in the bathroom area. The breakfast area was too crowded...not enough room for everyone to eat or stand in line. The food choices were scrambled eggs and all starches - donuts, cereal, waffles. No fresh fruit, no yogurt, no breakfast meat, etc.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: Janeaxle
Reviews.Content: We love this hotel. This was our second time to stay and was wonderful both times. Very clean and the beds were so comfortable. I would love to know what kind of beds and pillows they have because its the most comfortable bed we have ever slept on. When we got there they gave us a little bag of goodies. My son loved that they put popcorn in there. It had a few personal items in it also. They are a very friendly staff. Its also very quiet at night and there are short cuts on yellow route and all the way to silver dollar city just a couple blocks from hotel. Its in a great location. Bottom line, its a great place to stay and we will definitely go back again.

Reviews.Title: “motel review”
Reviews.Author: Maynard B
Reviews.Content: Almost a 5 star. This is a newer motel in a quiet area away from noise and traffic yet near the center of the strip with quick access to 76 and the bypass routes. Everything was very clean and neet, the bed was one of the best we have ever found in a motel, and room had everything needed. There was a light bulb missing but one call and service person had it replaced within 5 minutes. The hot breakfast was excellent however there was not enough seating and there was awaiting line to get in.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience!”
Reviews.Author: Sheila W
Reviews.Content: My husband, 10 year-old daughter and I stayed here in June in a 2 double-bed room. It is an older hotel but has been completely remodeled. It had real comforters, not the old quilted kind. It was so clean!!!!!! They gave us a welcome package and when we checked out they gave us a small box of chocolate candies. The pool was sparkling clean! The breakfast was great and the price even greater!!!

Reviews.Title: “Not a typical "motel"”
Reviews.Author: ns07
Reviews.Content: This place is a great value! We had a group of 4 and stayed for around $65. The rooms were really clean, had all the amenities you could need (iron, ironing board, fridge, microwave, large flat panel TV, etc.) The service was great. When we checked in we were given a "goodie bag", which included pop corn, candy, pantene shampoo & conditioner, etc. Again, this isn't much and nothing to get excited about, but for only $65 a night for 4 people, this definitely isn't your motel 6. Really impressed. Again room was clean, A/C worked fine. It was a pleasant stay, and close to everything in Branson. The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is because the breakfast is lackluster. There's Krispy Kreme doughnuts, and then typical continental breakfast foods (generic bagels, english muffins, etc.) There were 2 staff members that prepared waffles for people. Again, this is really awesome for something of this price....however, it is typical motel continental breakfast fare. Would have preferred either a discount in price of stay without breakfast option, or paid a little more for a better breakfast. During check out, they gave us a small box of Russel Stover. Again, nothing too exciting, but a nice touch for something at this price. Highly recommend that anyone stay here. Best value and quality is great!

Reviews.Title: “Clean room at a best value!”
Reviews.Author: DebbieKTustin
Reviews.Content: I would have rate this hotel 5 stars except for the bed sheets. Everything else is wonderful! It probably deserves a 4.5 stars. We stayed for 2 nights on 6/24 and 6/25 in a King suite. We were given a welcome package contains shampoo, conditioner, toothpaste, popcorn, and mouthwash. It was a really pleasant gift. Our room has a microwafe, fridge, and sofa. It is a large room and comfy. One of our light bulbsburned out and we called front desk and the guy brought and replaced it right away. We didn't use the pool since our limited time at Branson. The breakfast was awesome. The girls, mother and daughter, who works there is very friendly. They offer to make fresh waffles for everyone. They have biscuits, gravy, eggs, fruit, bagels, toasts, muffin, juice, coffee, cereal, milk, etc. The room is clean, the surroundings are clean, including the trash can outside. My husband was surprised that the hotel is maintained well and clean. It is really pleasant place to stay here. The only caveat is the bed sheet. I don't know what it is, I think our bed is King but the sheet does not fit the bed. Maybe they use a queen size but it looked like a king size. I don't know because of the pillow top or that the sheet has shrunk or what. The sheet didn't fit the mattress. It kept coming off the mattress. I found that its was not comfortable. We came to our room late nightly and didn't feel like to ask and complain. The sheet is also not smooth and silky. I like my sheet taut and smooth. The next day, the maid didn't fit the sheet taut and adjust it either. She kind of just threw the bed cover over it without readjusting the sheets underneath it. Again, I came back late to the hotel and didn't want to make a fuss. It didn't bother my husband much but it bothered me. On the way out, checking out, we were given a small box of Russel Stovers candy. It was a nice gesture. We will probably come back to this hotel next time and I hope they fix the sheet situation.

Reviews.Title: “No complaints for this Branson gem!”
Reviews.Author: TheresiaMO
Reviews.Content: We booked 2 rooms for 3 nights total with AAA discount. Both were by the pool side which was very convenient as we wanted to go swimming in the afternoon and evenings. We received a welcome gift on arrival and chocolates at check out. The room was typical motel size, and the beds were very comfortable. The rooms were exceptionally clean! Each room has a fridge and microwave. Continental breakfast was bagels/breads, eggs, biscuits and gravy, and waffles that the staff would make for you. They offered cut up tropical fruit, and we'd rather have had bananas, apples or oranges, but that is a minor issue. Location is easy access to the strip, and hotel was nice and quiet! All in all a very nice family motel that I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Yellow Rose”
Reviews.Author: Karen V
Reviews.Content: We thought this an excellent hotel. We have stayed in many others in Branson & this one is the best. It is very clean, the bed is comfortable, the air conditioning is cool & quiet, & the tv is big! They have a nice clean pool. They provide you with large beach towels & have several balls & noodles to play in the water with. The breakfast is very good with a large selection of food & very friendly ladies to assist you. The desk staff is very friendly & helpful, as well. We will certainly stay here again when we are in town & plan to recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: “vacation time”
Reviews.Author: Ellen G
Reviews.Content: Can't say enough good things about this hotel. The rooms were very clean and nicely decorated and the staff was so friendly and helpful. They give you a nice welcome bag on arrival and a small box of chocolates upon checkout. The breakfast was very good with plenty of variety. If you want a nice place to stay at a very reasonable price then this is the place to stay, you won't be disappointed! We will stay at this hotel every time we visit Branson. Thanks so much to all the staff for making our stay a nice one.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: Jennifer M
Reviews.Content: At check-in the person on duty was very nice. He helped me with getting money saving coupons and when I was finished and leaving he ran out and gave me a goody bag. Went to room and it was very nice. One flaw is it could use a coat of paint. The bed was super comfy. Pillow top with fluffy pillows and extra snuggle pillows. The room was quiet even though the motel was full. Slept great!!! Didn't want to get up the next morning just wanted to stay in the super soft bed. Breakfast area was very small and had to go out to gazebo when it was hot. The breakfast although was delicious and the lady working the area was very nice in making us a waffle. The pool area was fun for my family. It was clean and they had play toys for the kids. Wish there were towels at the pool area though. I was told after I was already in the pool that we would have to get them at the front desk. The whole experience was great and I would most definitely be back. We have always stayed at another hotel in Branson but decided based on reviews and price through Priceline that I would try this hotel. Glad I did it was a great hotel!!!

Reviews.Title: “Branson Yellow Rose Inn and Suites”
Reviews.Author: luv2travelKansas
Reviews.Content: This was a very nice and clean hotel. We would stay here again. The people are so friendly and go out of their way to help you with all your needs. The breakfast had a huge amount of things to pick from. The location was great. We weren't on the strip but everything we wanted to do was easily accessible. The pool was nice and warm. We would highly recommend staying here.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable and great customer service!”
Reviews.Author: dannifer
Reviews.Content: This was a very nice hotel for the price. The room was clean and the beds were very comfortable! It had a huge flat screen tv. I love the location that is close to everything but still out of the way enough to be secluded. They give very good directions also - just follow the signs. We didn't try the pool but it looked very nice. There was also a beautiful gazebo by it to sit and relax. The breakfast wasn't that great even for the typical hotel but when the rooms are clean and comfortable I can overlook that part. The only issue we had was a billing mistake that the young guy made who took my reservation. He got the date wrong by one night so when we arrived they had already billed us for the night before when we didn't show up and then didn't have our reservation for that night. However, the ladies at the desk handled it perfectly! They got us the exact room we had wanted and took off the charge for the other night. They apologized and I really think it was just a mistake made by a new employee. Since they handled it so well I would have no problem staying there again! I appreciated their professional and friendly attitude! When good customer service seems dead these days, it was a really nice surprise to be treated so well!

Reviews.Title: “We will stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: BetsyLee11
Reviews.Content: My husband, kids,and I just got home from our trip to Branson and we were so happy we chose to stay here. We were a bit skeptical about the hotel due to the low costs...we figured it was too good to be true, but went ahead and reserved our room due to the high rating on Tripadvisor. What a GREAT place to stay! So well kept, clean and the staff was so nice and helpful. The pool is bigger than we thought it'd be and we loved how comfortable the beds were. The only negatives were the small dining area for breakfast, but it didn't really matter because everything else this hotel has to offer made up for that. It's the little attention to details that really make an impression and you can tell the staff here strives to be as hospitable as they can. The little welcome goodie bag and chocolates when you leave added to our experience! Great value for this great place to stay and we really look forward to returning in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: HowitzerWife
Reviews.Content: We stayed two nights at a GREAT price! Staff was helpful in directing us a different route to the Yellow Rose than our GPS directed us (too avoid the large hill). The location is a few stop lights from "the strip". We were greated with a goodie bag and treated to a box of chocolates when we left. The room was clean and the pillow top mattres was soft, the a/c worked really well and the 40' t.v. was nice.Our room was next to the stairs we could hear the foot steps of heavy footed guest and children going/running up and down.There is an elevator to accommodate guest to the 2nd and 3rd floors as well. The breakfast had wonderful choices and the staff was very helpful and even offered to make us a waffle. However the eating area was cramped during breakfast rush.(There is an eating area outside as well.) I'd suggest shortening the bar area to make more room for the tables. There is a pool that we didn't use but the kids there seemed to be enjoying it! We enjoyed our stay Yellow Rose Inn and would stay choose Yellow Rose on our next trip.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place”
Reviews.Author: OKfam4
Reviews.Content: My family of 4 stayed 4 nights overlooking the pool. Check in was fast and impressive. The room was clean, nice and updated with a fridge, microwave and flat screen tv. Beds were soft pillow top just like I prefer. Breakfast was good with friendly service just like the other reviews state. My children enjoyed the pool along with several pool toys belonging to the facility. The A/C unit kept up during the 100+ degree days too! Please accept my criticism as constructive not to detour anyone from staying in the hotel. We enjoyed our stay and would definately stay here again when visiting Branson for a couple of days but I must be honest. My cons: The door (Room 230) hangs up where you have to jerk to open and slam to close (wouldn't be good with a sleeping baby); The toilet handle had to be held down a long time to flush; the water temp in the shower never stayed constant, it fluctuated temp every 30 seconds or so; The maidservice did a good job cleaning every day but didn't make our beds...they pulled the sheet and comforter to the top and set the pillows. I found myself pulling back the bedding to stretch the fitted sheet every night. I even left a $4 tip every day; And last, at check in, we were told the pool closes at 10:00pm but we found that guests used the pool until 11:00. We only had one night where there was a noise problem and that was Saturday night. Again, I want to make clear that these inconveniences were minor where we didn't even complan to the front desk (plus I didn't want anyone working in our room). They were all items I can live with for sixty some bucks a night. If we were at the Hilton, this would not have been acceptable. This one is hard for me to rate. I gave it a 4 compared to other hotels in Branson. I give it a 3 (average) compared to other non-Branson hotels. It's better than Angel Inn, Amazinn Suites, Honeysuckle and even the Radisson.

Reviews.Title: “Away from it all”
Reviews.Author: Scott W
Reviews.Content: Really enjoyed this hotel. Off the main roads, but still close to everything. Our room was very quite and the pool looked nice (to many people in it to go swimming. Overall an excellent hotel for the price

Reviews.Title: “More than just a great bargain!”
Reviews.Author: Tabby R
Reviews.Content: Our room was clean, classy, and bed was extremely comfortable. Our free breakfast was probably the best I've had in a real long time, and staff was friendly and helpful. Kudos goes to the management for employees that actually want to be there and show they appreciate your business. Hotel is off the main strip, so it was a quieter area that was just close enough to everything we wanted to do. Not only do I want to stay there again, but I will be recommending this hotel to my family and other friends!

Reviews.Title: “Great Value for the Money”
Reviews.Author: ChanceMom
Reviews.Content: Very clean facility! The staff are all very personable and helpful. The only downfall is the breakfast. The food was good, but a bit overwhelming with carbohydrates! Didn't stop us from eating though! We got a small gift bag when registering and a box of chocolates when leaving! Will definitly be back.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay, great price for the quality!”
Reviews.Author: gordluck
Reviews.Content: Wonderful staff, and a very nice room, we were given a gift bag checking in and a small box of chocolates checking out. These folks really appreciate your business.

Reviews.Title: “Great bargain and wonderful staff”
Reviews.Author: SteveLicata
Reviews.Content: We stayed here based on previous TripAdvisor ratings and even then were surprised at how pleasant was our 4-night stay. The very clean, well-maintained rooms are well-appointed, with extra cushions, pillows, big flat screen TV and other comforts way beyond what you might expect in the this price range ($60-$85/nt). The hotel is located in a very quiet secluded, woodsy area just a few minutes from "The Strip". The included breakfast has everything - waffles, cereal, eggs, -- all served with the help of a very pleasant and attentive staff. In short, this place shows that they really appreciate your business.

Reviews.Title: “Yellow Rose - Wonderful Experience!”
Reviews.Author: TJ S
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at the Yellow Rose for 3 nights, and it was a wonderful stay. A "gift bag" and check in, and a parting gift of chocolates - what a pleasant surprise! Clean and fresh rooms, wonderful, friendly staff. Breakfast great each morning - the "Waffle Queen" did great. Helpful with tickets for shows - made it a breeze, and saved us money too! So nice to have an elevator to upper floor - many such places don't! When we visit Branson again, and we will, we are definitely staying at the Yellow Rose!

Reviews.Title: “Great Vacation Experience”
Reviews.Author: Ann F
Reviews.Content: After much research for hotel/motels in the Branson area, my husband and I chose the Yellow Rose Inn. Cleanliness was the most important factor in our decision and I am glad to say we were not disappointed with our choice. The hotel was easy to find and was located off the main strip which made it very quiet. As others mentioned, we also had problems with the sheet coming off the mattress at night. The ladies that prepared breakfast were very friendly and the dining area was very clean. Everything about "The Yellow Rose Inn" had a very welcoming, homelike atmosphere. The only thing that would make this hotel better would be to vary the breakfast choices. I took my own pillow and much to my dismay discovered on our way home that I had left it. When I arrived home I had a call that it had been turned in to the office. The front desk offered to ship it to me. Great experience for us and I will be happy to recommend this hotel to others and I will certainly stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Branson Visit - June 25-29, 2012”
Reviews.Author: Howard S
Reviews.Content: Basically excellent! Only problem was mix-up with priceline.com that changed 4 nights to 3. Hotel corrected that instantly. Excellent room with two queen beds. Only problem was that my short (4' 7") mom could not easily get into the bed. They went out the next day and bought a step so she would no longer have a problem. Excellent location just off hwy 165 1 mile south of hwy 76. Excellent value and enjoyed the daily breakfast service. Extremely friendly staff. Certainly will stay here the next time I am in Branson too.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel & Great Value”
Reviews.Author: christnme
Reviews.Content: Decided to try this hotel after reading other reviews. A little off the beaten path, watch for signs. I was thrilled to find a coupon in travelbuddy for $59.00 a night, which they honored. The front desk was very nice and even gave us a gift bag full of goodies such as popcorn, shampoo, conditioner and more. Got to the room as was very pleased. The beds are amazingly soft pillowtops, the bedding very nice, new carpet, large flat screen t.v., nice size shower and most important...VERY CLEAN!! Breakfast had two very nice ladies attending to your needs....nice touch. It was a good cont. breakfast with eggs, waffels, donuts, biscuits, gravy, fruit, bagels, toast, oatmeal, cerel and a few other items. This hotel is outdoor cooridors (I usually like indoor), but I was able to overlook due to the value!!! There is an outdoor pool, but we didn't try it out. Very nice hotel for the price!! Keep up the good work Yellow Rose Inn and I will continue to give you my business!!

Reviews.Title: “Very clean and friendly”
Reviews.Author: Kenneth N
Reviews.Content: My wife and I spent 2 nights and found it pleasant. A problem with our reservation was handled as best as it could be. We reserved the room over the internet asking for a roll-in shower and when we got there it wasn't available the first night. I suggest if you need a room with special features you call the hotel just to be sure it is available. I found the king size mattress to soft for my liking but the wife slept well, also like most hotels the sheets never seem to fit properly and the corners would come off at night. On the bright side the staff was great and did their very best to make things right. The rooms are very clean and quiet, we never heard our neighbors.
