They have a very nice pool that families really love and serve a good breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Oh my God!!!”
Reviews.Author: Guillermhotell
Reviews.Content: (sorry for my english) I haved stayed in a several motels in USA. Im a tourist. Ok, when i arrived to Yellow Rose Inn, i almost shocked. Yes, but for very good impresion. The staff very gently. Good people arround. Good neighborhood. So safe. Mi room, so beautifull. So clean. Guest Laundry awesome. I think, i need to pay a couple of twenties most, because relation price-cost is very good. Congratulations! When i back to the city. This location will be mi first choice.

Reviews.Title: “You WON'T be disappointed!”
Reviews.Author: Julie W
Reviews.Content: Our family of four (children ages 11 & 14) just spent 6 nights at The Yellow Rose. My husband travels frequently on business and usually has hotel points, so we typically vacation at Marriott or Hilton hotels. After reading so many great TripAdvisor reviews, we decided to give The Yellow Rose a try so that we could work more shows into the budget. We were NOT disappointed! :-) Here's the scoop: This is a motel and not a hotel (doors open to the outside.) It isn't our usual, but I actually enjoyed the change. We upgraded (for a very small fee) to a pool view room, which was also really nice. However, I can see that there would also be convenience perks to being on the parking lot side if you'd be coming and going frequently. The rooms are nicely decorated with comfee beds and nice bedding. The 40 inch flat screen tv, free internet, roomy new fridge, and microwave are just a few of the many convenience items located in the rooms We were equally as pleased with the staff during our stay. Our room was continually well-maintained and cleaning staff always spoke and smiled each time we met them in passing. The front desk staff was also very pleasant and helpful at any time we asked questions. NOW for my favorites. . . the SWEET SWEET ladies who do breakfast can't be beat. They literally make you feel like you're walking into their personal kitchen. . . and that they're thankful you're there. One of them is the "waffle maker" (OMGosh- the BEST waffles EVER) and the other can often be found inspecting the scrambled eggs and making sure the tables meet inspection. ;-) This was continually a GREAT way to start off each day of our vacation. And did I mention that the breakfast was complimentary? :) :) :) All in all, this was a GREAT value! Each and every staff member seems to appreciate and take pride in their role as a "vacation enrichment expert." ;-) We have been to Branson 6 or 7 times in the last 14 years and I think we've found our Home Away From Home here at the Yellow Rose Inn. I just hate that we didn't find it sooner and save some serious cash!

Reviews.Title: “Would go back”
Reviews.Author: msamylynn96
Reviews.Content: We just stayed for 5 nights at the Yellow Rose. We were very pleased with our stay. The staff and cleaning crew were very friendly. The beds were very comfortable. We seemed to have some ill-fitting sheets that didn't seem quite the right size for the pillow top mattress, and they came off once during the night. I think another reviewer also posted of this issue, so not sure if all of the rooms are like this or not. The room was very clean. We reserved a poolside room and it was directly by the pool, which was very convenient. As a frequent visitor to Branson, we loved the location. It was off the busy strip, but close to everything. We had no problem finding the place. I do wish that breakfast included bacon or sausage so there would be a few lower carb options. and the breakfast area needs to be a bit bigger. Also, the deck/gazebo area should be made non-smoking. There seemed to be a lot of smokers standing out in the corridors and on the gazebo. Despite the minor suggestions, the place was absolutely perfect for the price and we would go back without hesitation.

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: VADeels
Reviews.Content: I put my faith in trip advisor and booked a room because it was such a great price. My husband and I agreed that we had stayed in hotels for twice the money that were not near as nice. Our bed was comfortable and the room was very clean. Front desk staff was helpful in getting us tickets to a show and recommending places to eat. If I were in Branson again, I would definitely stay at the Yellow Rose.

Reviews.Title: “What an awesome place!”
Reviews.Author: YFerguson
Reviews.Content: First of all, we were very impressed with the friendliness of the check in staff. We were greeted with a smiling face and given a neat little "goodie" bag with some nice essentials! Once we entered our room we were very impressed with the cleanliness. The beds were very comfortable and the TV was better than average. The motel was booked for the night, yet it was very quiet. Once we got home and three days later I realized that I had left my iPad in the dresser drawer in our room. I panicked thinking it would never be recovered. I called the motel desk immediately and explained my dilemma thinking it was too late. She took my information and said she would check to see if anyone had turned it in. I was called less than 15 minutes later and told that someone had turned it in to the manager and they had it for safe keeping. I was THRILLED! Most places would not have done that and housekeeping would have most likely kept it for themselves. That was not the case at Yellow Rose Inn and Suites! I would recommend this place to everyone and we are looking forward to our next weekend away in Branson! We will be back!!

Reviews.Title: “Unexpected surprise”
Reviews.Author: bw316
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel because it was cheap and had a pool for our 2 kids. This hotel exceeded any expectations I had, from the newly remodeled rooms, to the beautiful flowers around the gazebos. Hot breakfast was actually good, and I looked forward to eating breakfast there. The pool was always clean, and they provided toys for the kids as well. 42 inch tv, multiple wi-fi connections, new mini fridge was a nice touch. And the staff was friendly and put us poolfront as a nice touch. I will stay there again the next time I am in Branson

Reviews.Title: “"EXCELLENT"”
Reviews.Author: JMC85
Reviews.Content: I have just returned from my trip to Branson. My choice of hotel could not have been better. The beds are so comfortable, the flat screen tv was a nice touch. Everybody from the front desk staff, to the breakfast ladies were extremely pleasant and helpful. The only downside I can think of would be not having a hot tub. It would be nice to be able to soak your tired body after a long day out exploring Branson. My sister, my mom and myself did the zipline at Shepards Hill. We all enjoyed it very much. My mom is 75 and she wants to do it again. Please dont hesitate to stay here, you will be glad you did,.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay!”
Reviews.Author: Kinstersmom
Reviews.Content: This is a great place to stay! We really enjoyed our stay here, the staff is very friendly and helpful, the rooms are nice, the beds are comfy, the pool was fun and we love the cleaning lady on the 3rd floor. The Sonic at the end of the street was awesome too! :) A+ from me.

Reviews.Title: “What a delightful discovery!”
Reviews.Author: Rob H
Reviews.Content: My family and I have stayed at the Yellow Rose Inn four times in the past two years and it is without a doubt the finest motel we have every visited. The staff - all the staff - were wonderful, from the fellow at the front desk to the restaurant staff to the maids who took care of our room. The management there must set a great "tone at the top" to achieve this kind of attitudinal consistency. The extra touches - such as pool toys for the kids -- set it further apart. It is by far the best value in Branson and we look forward to future stays there.

Reviews.Title: “Clean Room, Nice People, Good Price, Free Breakfast!”
Reviews.Author: Diana M
Reviews.Content: This hotel was very nice, clean, smelled great. The people at the check in counter were very friendly and helpful, gave us a nice gift bag, breakfast was nice, with excellent help, personally made us waffles every day. Very good experience and will be going back to this hotel in future.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!”
Reviews.Author: scase
Reviews.Content: We had a great stay here! The air conditioner works great! The beds were comfy and the room clean! For an older remodeled motel, I don't think you could get much better! Great bargain for what you get!!! :)

Reviews.Title: “Clean and very quiet!”
Reviews.Author: Sarah S
Reviews.Content: At first I wasn't sure about staying at this hotel especially since it has outdoor corridors. However after reading reviews on Trip Advisor I decided to take a chance. Everyone was right, the rooms were very clean and beds very comfortable. This hotel is off the beaten path and the only thing I did not like was the location of the room because it faced a neighborhood and I wanted to look at the Ozarks. Price is very reasonable and I highly recommend it!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Extremely clean, quiet, great price and helpful staff!”
Reviews.Author: Patty M
Reviews.Content: My husband and I went to Branson for our 43rd wedding anniversary. Thanks to a co-worker telling me about the Yellow Rose, I called them the night before we would be there. Lucky for us they had a room for 3 nights on the weekend and it was the best stay we have ever had in our 43 years. It was so clean. I never sleep with all the noise you hear in motels and hotels, "this one is so quiet I could not believe it". We had a room on the 3rd floor in the back away from the pool, ice and elevator, best time we've ever had. The staff is so helpful. When we checked in they offered to help us get discount tickets to the sites we came to see. Best prices ever, no hassle and the tickets were delivered to our motel. Very clean, pillow top beds and so comfortable. Big Tv, Frig and Microwave. Great breakfast and helpful staff. The motel is off the strip but close to all the roads to all the sites. It is nestled in the trees and so peaceful. I hope they always have room for us, it's the only place I want to stay when we go to Branson from now on. I will definitely recommend this one. Patty M.

Reviews.Title: “Best stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: Cathy S
Reviews.Content: After 2 nites in Missouri we stayed here it was my favorite.The room decor was so inviting we were tired when we arrived.The beds were so comfy plenty of pillows.I like to take baths the tub was nice and large.Just a wonderful goodnights stay this will be my choice each time in Branson.Was so peaceful had a very good feel to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and friendly”
Reviews.Author: Barb C
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at the Yellow Rose for a couple of nights because I read good reviews. The staff was so friendly and allowed us to check in early. The room was very clean and nicely decorated. The rates were so reasonable, and even included breakfast. Our family likes to spend time every year in Branson, and when we are all together we stay at Thousand Hills so that we can stay together, however, when my husband and I come alone, we will stay at the Yellow Rose. I also have told the rest of my family about this inn. It was a great find!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent with changes”
Reviews.Author: Sharon R
Reviews.Content: My husband and I had booked a king room. When we got there they put us in the back on the 3rd floor which overlooked a parking lot. I was very disapointed after reading such good reviews. I went back to the desk and asked for another room in the front. I was treated very graciously and after paying $22.00 more dollars (a total of $69 a night) was given a room in the front by the pool. It was well worth the extra money. You could see hills and sunset and it was beautiful. The room was very clean and nice. Room was a little small with the smallest bathroom I have ever seen but looked newly updated with large screen TV. Breakfast was good but very crowded and the 2nd day my husband & I elected to fix a tray and go back to our room. Overall as long as you can get a room in the front of the hotel your stay will be very enjoyable. Pool area is nice and plenty of chairs and nice scenery that overlooks hills. Room was very quiet - you could not hear a thing through the walls. Great!

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay for the money”
Reviews.Author: Deidra M
Reviews.Content: My family (2 teenagers, husband, and myself) booked a room through Priceline. We have visited Branson often and each time chose a different place to stay. Last year we stayed at a hotel that we all really liked, and intended to stay at again, but this year it was closed due to the tornado from March. So I checked reviews before booking the Yellow Rose. When we arrived for check-in, the hotel room was booked as a King suite instead of the Double Queen. I had my confirmation print out with me showing the booking as a Double. This was not the hotel's fault, but rather Priceline's. The hotel clerk told me that they used to have Booking.com handle online reservations, but now Priceline is handling Booking.com as well. I believe this is where the mix up occurred. Anyway, the clerk made a few adjustments, told me it wasn't the end of the world, and found us a Double Queen. (Keep in mind, the hotel was full of booked doubles.) He called housekeeping to make sure the room we were getting was ready and clean. We had to wait a few minutes, but the room was excellent. In fact, this was the cleanest hotel we have ever stayed in. Housekeeping does a fantastic job. There is breakfast every morning; eggs, donuts, bagels, biscuits and gravy, cereal, and they will cook a massive waffle if you would like. The breakfast room is smallish, but there are two gazebos outside furnished for taking your breakfast outside. We never had a problem finding a place to eat. The staff is very friendly, helpful, and accommodating. There is free wifi, great for my kids' iPod touches and my iPad. There is a small pool outside, the only frown I could find. It isn't heated, so on cooler days/nights my kids wouldn't swim. We normally stay where there is both an indoor and outdoor pool. Yet, despite that, we would stay again. The hotel is away from the main strip, but very accessible to all the roads and main routes. We could quickly get to where we were going (both ends of town). Very quiet area and nice place to take a morning walk/run without a lot of traffic. The beds were comfortable, decor modern, flat screen tv, and one thing we noticed right away was the lack of noise! In most hotels we have stayed in, we could hear noises from other rooms, such as tv or talking.

Reviews.Title: “Affordable”
Reviews.Author: Lesley J
Reviews.Content: My family enjoyed our stay at the Yellow Rose. The kids loved the pool and took full advantage of it daily.One of the staff even gave them fresh warm towels after they where done swimming.I saw the cleaning crew working hard every day and we where pleased with the service.What I liked most was despite the fact that the cleaning crew and ladies in the breakfast area where very busy,they where alway friendly and made me and my family feel welcomed .Keep up the good work!

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed our Stay”
Reviews.Author: Rob K
Reviews.Content: The Yellow Rose has very comfortable beds, a fridge, a microwave, and a 40 inch flat screen tv in each room. We enjoyed our stay alot. The staff was very friendly as well.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Elaine C
Reviews.Content: Yellow Rose is an awesome deal for the price. The rooms were very clean, decor was up to date, and the rooms were big. But by far the best part about the place were the people. Everyone there was extremely nice and always willing to help. We were always greeted with a smile! We will stay here every time we go to Branson. It's away from the main strip but close enough where you can get to anywhere in less than 10 minutes.

Reviews.Title: “june 9,2012”
Reviews.Author: ok56
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed may stay at the Yellow Rose the staff was very helpful and very friendly. The room was very clean and comfortable a very nice Hotel to stay at. I will stay here again. The breakfast was good and feeling the staff was very helpful with your needs.

Reviews.Title: “Branson Family Trip”
Reviews.Author: Jenny C
Reviews.Content: This hotel is the deal of the century!!! It was well priced and the rooms, pool, and breakfast area were extremely clean. The breakfast was wonderful and offered a variety of foods to choose from. The staff were tremendously helpful and kind! The location was perfect, very close to the attractions but not directly on the strip which made it much easier to get around town. I will return to Branson Yellow Rose Inn the next time I stay in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “WILL STAY HERE AGAIN!!!”
Reviews.Author: lvtotravelmo
Reviews.Content: Stayed two nights. Nice room, frig, microwave, coffee pot. The bed was quite comfortable. Best of all....the room was very, very clean. Breakfast was good. The ladies worked very hard to ensure there was plenty of food, kept the area clean. Front desk ladies, Nancy and Mari very accommodating. Great rates. This hotel is a couple of miles from main strip but well worth staying here. Quite, clean, etc.

Reviews.Title: “As Advertised”
Reviews.Author: Tim G
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 2 nights, after reading reviews, we were expecting something special and the Yelloow Rose delivered. Check-in was quick and courteous. Welcome package was as nice as we got from Wyndham Resorts as owners. Room was clean and clean smelling. Large TV was great and internet was simple and easy to use,fridge and microwave made it extra nice. We were near pool - a litle concerned about noise - but that wasn't an issue and the pool closed promptly at 10PM to ensure that. Check-out was as good as check-in. We usually come to Branson twice a year, we now have a new favorite place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Very impressive!”
Reviews.Author: fotefote
Reviews.Content: What a great value! I've never had such a nice experience at a hotel in this price range. Rooms are cute, pillowtop beds are very comfortable, and they add a few nice touches like giving us a bag of microwave popcorn when we arrived and a little box of chocolates when we left. We had everything we needed in the room--nice TV, little refrigerator, microwave, hair dryer, coffee maker with tea and coffee, iron and ironing board. I highly recommend this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Very Pleasant and quiet stay”
Reviews.Author: Jim W
Reviews.Content: Yellow Rose does live up to its reviews. Very soft king size pillowtop bed, nice tv, refrig/microwave, coffeemaker, hair dryer and last but not least was an ironing board w/iron. Very courteous staff and all the folks that we met while staying there were wonderful. My advice is to stay here, saving your money for the awesome shows in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “I will come back”
Reviews.Author: christie s
Reviews.Content: Yellow Rose was a very nice hotel. Everyone treated us excellent. We truly enjoyed coming down every morning for the yummy breakfast. We liked eating outside in the gazebo area. The only thing I would say about that is..... it rained a couple nights and in the morning the chairs were wet and we had to eat inside ( not a big deal because the inside is very charming as well ) Maybe if the gazebo had some sort of better covering so that when it did rain the inside didnt get wet. Other than that I wouldnt change a thing. My family and I will be back for sure !!!! Thank you to all the staff at Yellow Rose Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay... Quiet and off the strip..”
Reviews.Author: Robert S
Reviews.Content: We have finally found a place we will be staying at whenever we are in Branson, MO.. And yes very quiet and the beds are just as good as the Hilton...

Reviews.Title: “Quiet, off the strip!”
Reviews.Author: Carl M
Reviews.Content: Quiet, clean motel off the Branson strip with excellent breakfast. Both front desk staff and breakfast staff were very friendly and helpful with any needs you asked for. Room was cleaned quickly while we were gone. Room smelled clean - no 'old motel smell'! Somewhat more difficult to find motel as it's off the beaten path of Branson, but well worth the search, resulting in a good night's sleep.

Reviews.Title: “cjohnson”
Reviews.Author: c j
Reviews.Content: awesome Everyone was very freindly, room was very nice & clean,was very helpful in getting show ticket for us. Only 5 minutes away from the main strip.Would definitely choose to stay here on our next trip to Branson !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Friendly but funny smell”
Reviews.Author: Redhawks94
Reviews.Content: Our room had a strong smell when you first walked in. Not sure if it was their cleaning supplies or just an old room. The air conditioner smelled like dirty feet. The staff was very friendly. The give you a goody bag at check in and a sweet treat at check out. Breakfast is good and i like the location - just off the strip and a little hidden.

Reviews.Title: “Just okay”
Reviews.Author: RAutry
Reviews.Content: Stayed 3 nights in late May (27-29). Decided to "take a chance" based upon very favorable reviews on this site. Stay in a King Suite was okay. Room had been remodeled and was clean and relatively comfortable. Bathroom was tiny and functional only because the door opened outward. Counter tops were old style laminate and appliances (sink & toilet) seemed undersized. Service was excellent - the microwave popcorn coming in and box of chocolates going out were nice touches. Desk attendant was most helpful in getting our three day show schedule finalized and show tickets delivered to our room. Breakfast was okay but a little hectic. Lots of diners in a very confined space and others waiting to be seated. Hot food choices (waffles and eggs) were nice touches - my waffle was prepared by an attendant and delivered to my table almost as soon as I was seated. Overall experience was fine - it was just a little below that of some newer Marriot & Hilton facilities we stayed in during this same trip. That shouldn't be surprising given the relative cost of the per night lodging costs ($80 vs $120). Would I make a return visit? Yes. Would my wife make a return visit? Maybe, with a little gentle persuasion.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome!”
Reviews.Author: trishcu
Reviews.Content: The beds are worth the stay! It was like sleeping on a cloud! The staff was excellent! Overall the best hotel I've stayed in!

Reviews.Title: “Very good property, great value”
Reviews.Author: bill1766
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Yellow Rose with my wife on a vacation trip to Branson. We had originally booked at a name-brand hotel, but decided to try the Yellow Rose because it was half the price. Good move. This is a sizable motel-type place that has been thoroughly renovated. Our room was big enough, comfortable and well-equipped, including a refrigerator and microwave. The housekeeping was outstanding, one of the cleanest places I've stayed. The rooms must be nearly soundproof -- we enjoyed peace and quiet the whole time we were there. Nice little extras: a surprise welcome bag that included toiletries and even popcorn for the microwave. The daily free breakfast was substantial: scrambled eggs, mixed fruit, hot and cold cereal, made-to-order waffles, juice, bagels and English muffins, and of course coffee and tea. Helpful attendants on duty. There's a well-kept eating area, but you can also take your food outside and eat on an attractive patio. At checkout, they gave us a little box of Russell Stover chocolates. Nice touch. The staff were very friendly and helpful, including arranging discounted show tickets. The only disappointment was the swimming pool -- it was well maintained and the water was crystal-clear, but the pool was too small for anything more than cooling off. Certainly not suitable for lap swimmers. Although it takes a little map-reading (or GPS help) to find the inn, it's actually not more than five minutes from the heart of the main drag, Route 76 (Country Music Boulevard) where the majority of the shows and restaurants are located. Overall, we were very pleased. A wonderful bargain inn, staffed by really nice folks.

Reviews.Title: “loved our stay at the Yellow Rose”
Reviews.Author: Liz M
Reviews.Content: I definitely recommend The yellow Rose to everyone,we love our stay there,we had 2 queen pillow top beds,coffee pot,tv,microwave,hair dryer,iron and board...ever a shower despencer in tub with shower gel ,they also had beach towels for swimming pool.rooms was very clean,carpet look like new....matching comforter set on both beds...breakfast was very good and great service....very pleased with our stay,If we ever get to come back to Branson....the yellow rose is the place for me and my family

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: SUSAN R
Reviews.Content: We came to Branson not knowing where we were going to spend two nights.Looking in a guide from the welcome center we saw:The Yellow Rose! Non smoking,no pets allowed and new pillow topped beds! We arrived and found all that to be true and more!Excellent service from Cat.Great hot breakfast ,served by wonderfull mother and daughter team,waffle cooked perfectly!Off the beaten path(quiet)but just minutes off the strip.All this for 50.00!per nite,you can't beat it! One thing:when you get time if you coverbreakfast gazebo you"ll have more room for the breakfast crowd! Thanks again!

Reviews.Title: “Yellow Rose Inn & Suites -- Branson”
Reviews.Author: baswan
Reviews.Content: Great Motel!!!! -- great staff -- everyone was friendly and very helpful. Breakfast was good and the staff in there exceptional as well. Nice quiet rooms, comfortable beds. Bathroom was a bit small but other than that great, great, great. Very affordable. Great location. Would definitely stay there again and recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!”
Reviews.Author: thatmommygirl4
Reviews.Content: Clean and awesome rates. Staff was very friendly. I wished I could have brought the bed home with me ;) LOVED the breakfast and the mother/daughter breakfast staff was super nice. We didn't get a chance to try the pool but will next time. We will definitely be back!

Reviews.Title: “Great place, great location”
Reviews.Author: kshope
Reviews.Content: We wish every room we stayed at was as nice and especially as clean as those at the Yellow Rose. The room was very comfortable, the king size pillow top bed was the great, there was large flat screen tv, refrigerator and microwave, coffee pot, wi-fi; everything we needed. Also a full breakfast every day with homemade waffles,biscuits and gravy, and scrambled eggs. The only thing I missed was fresh fruit, especially bananas, there was a canned fruit salad. The location was excellent, off the main road and nestled in among time shares and condos, but just minutes from everything. We were too busy to use the outdoor covered seating areas for relaxing, but would have enjoyed them. The staff was friendly and helpful, and even arranged tickets for us to pick up right there. Would definitely recommend this gem, a great value for the money.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean & in budget hotel.. !!”
Reviews.Author: rashmin_cby
Reviews.Content: Pros: Nice, clean, quite, within budge Cons: Little far inside fron highway 76

Reviews.Title: “Stay here”
Reviews.Author: Kimo-Sabey1
Reviews.Content: Great internet coupon and breakfast included with room.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent little Gem.”
Reviews.Author: rosevilleca
Reviews.Content: This lodging is excellent. The location is just off the main Branson strip (maybe 2 miles) but far enough away, and nestled into the side of a hill for quiet, and I mean quiet sleeping. Exterior noise is non-existant, and there seems to be a lot of sound insulation between rooms. I never heard my neighbors. The pool is nice, breakfast is really decent, with hot waffles and scrambled eggs every morning, and an assortment of sweet rolls, etc. Where this place really shines is in the service and cleanliness. This is the cleanest hotel/motel/suites I have ever stayed in. It's that clean. The manager is meticulous and holds her staff to a super high standard. There are two nice outdoor gazebo like eating areas, besides the breakfast area. I really loved this place. The air conditioner worked really well, too. :) I am not affiliated with the Yellow Rose Inn. My family stayed here for a trip to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Quiet Rooms and an Excellent Value!”
Reviews.Author: MadScrapperMom
Reviews.Content: Wow, what a gem!!! The Yellow Rose is an EXCELLENT value. The room was exceptionally clean and packed with amenities like a mini fridge, microwave, hair dryer, iron and ironing board. The beds were pillow top and very comfortable. Towels were thick and plentiful. The room was very quiet and once inside our room we didn't hear noise from the neighboring rooms. The mother/daughter team that operates the daily breakfast were so friendly and accommodating and made the effort to speak to our special needs daughter every morning. Professional and hard working staff. We were very pleased with our stay and plan to be return visitors. Thank you for a pleasant stay!

Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: Vince35
Reviews.Content: Clean and no complaints. The rates were wonderful. We will be staying here again! For sure!

Reviews.Title: “Quiet stay, good service”
Reviews.Author: Rogueangel1212
Reviews.Content: Only real gripe about the place is that the power went out in our unit 3 times during our 2 day stay while my wife was blow drying her hair. Staff was prompt to flip the breaker back on, but after the second time all I could think was,"really?" Also they said it would be fixed and never was. Otherwise staff was helpful and courteous. Room had a "dressed up" motel feel, and was average for a so called "suite". For the price I have stayed at better hotels (although it was a holiday weekend). The room was very clean, and breakfast is served 6:30-9:30 (Should be until 10:30, who wants to get up before 8-9 on vacation?). The place didn't quite meet my expectations being newly remodeled, but it wasn't a bad place to stay. I would consider staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “maybe not such a hidden gem!”
Reviews.Author: bdnewt007
Reviews.Content: let me start by saying I don't like to leave negative reviews, I read all kinds of reviews before booking a week and a half in advance at the yellow rose inn. I was so excited to find a motel as one person put it a hidden "gem" in branson, my wife booked a room with kat for the 26th on the bottom floor, when wife arrived she spoke to a man named jake and he said that he had no record of it being on the bottom floor so he put them on top floor at the back of the motel, now we are 45 years old so no biggie for us to go to top floor, but my mother is 68 and a few months back had a heart attack. so for her it was a big deal hence the reason for booking in advance! my wife spoke to a woman in house cleaning and she was super nice and told my wife that the room upstairs was nicer then downstairs because of new remodeling. room was nice, beds were nice, so i really want to be fair in writing this review. motel is older and has usual problems for an older motel. air conditioning froze up and also toilet would act like it did not want to flush. my wife went back and spoke to jake upon checkout and told him that she thought the reason that they stuck them on the back of motel was because of a coupon for $49 dollars a night. he admitted that it was the truth that the computer was the culprit that it would automaticly put you in back, so dont use a coupon just pay regular price if you want a front room. I mean this place no ill will, its just that alot of people that go to branson on vacation are older with health problems and my family was a little dissapointed with the service.

Reviews.Title: “WOW”
Reviews.Author: ChastainsLongviewTX
Reviews.Content: This motel had the friendliest staff and was super clean. The pillow top mattresses were so comfortable. The homemade to order waffles for breakfast were delicious as well all the other items to choose from ...had to try something different each morning. They also helped get great seats at shows for a discounted price ...we will definetly stay there again. There are also beautiful out door gazebos to enjoy.

Reviews.Title: “EXCELLENT”
Reviews.Author: Beverly A
Reviews.Content: The Yellow Rose is the most wonderful experience . The staff was superb and very informative. I was honored to stay at the Yellow Rose and I would recommend to anyone. The rooms were very clean and smelt wonderful. The breakfast was great. Thank you for our stay and will return . Sincerely Beverly Adams

Reviews.Title: “Yellow Rose is the Best”
Reviews.Author: Larry C
Reviews.Content: We had the great experience of staying at the Yellow Rose while we were in Branson. Great clean rooms, Very pleasant staff, and just the nicest group of people anywhere. They had a wonderful breakfast spread and the Mother/Daughter team were marvelous with good food especially the Buiscuits and Gravey. The hotel is off the beaten path but only minutes from the entertainment theatres Branson has to offer. We will be returning next year for our next anniversary. You will enjoy.

Reviews.Title: “Exceeded My Expectations for the Price!”
Reviews.Author: Tiffani M
Reviews.Content: My husband and I just celebrated our 4 year wedding anniversary and we wanted to get out of town for the weekend. We decided to go to Branson and do some shopping and just spend time together. We are on a tight budget, so in order to make our trip happen I needed to find an inexpensive hotel that would also be a pleasant place to stay after we were through exploring the town. I researched several hotels and read many many reviews over just about every hotel in Branson. I stumbled across The Yellow Rose Inn and Suites and started reading reviews about it. They were all very positive reviews and the price was amazing! I searched for the Yellow Rose on other review sites as well to see if all of the reviews matched up and 99% of the reviews I read were all positive. I looked at photos of the rooms and they looked very nice for the price as well. I was convinced that this was the place to try and I am glad we did! The hotel is located just far enough away from the strip that it is relaxing and quiet but still very convenient. The beds were super comfy and the TV was a good size. The rooms are not very big but they are plenty big enough to relax in. When we checked in the lady at the desk was very friendly and gave us popcorn for later. They have a complimentary breakfast like none other that I have ever seen at a one star hotel. Waffles, eggs, cereals, donuts etc. I was so tired the first morning that I did not feel like going to get breakfast so my husband went to grab a donut or something and they gave him a tray to bring food back to me in the room. When we checked out two days later we recieved a small box of chocolates to thank us for staying there. I know these things aren't a huge expense or big deal but it is the thought behind it that matters to me. We paid a very inexpensive price fo our King room therefore was not expecting the kind of service we got. It well exceeded my expectations and we are planning another trip to Branson in a month and this is definitely where I will book our rooms. I was very pleased.

Reviews.Title: “Great weekend”
Reviews.Author: Shirley L
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I stayed here for our Birthday weekend and couldn't of been happier with our stay. All of the staff was very friendly and we enjoyed the SPECIAL treats we were given when we checked in we received popcorn and when we checked out a box of chocolates both a nice surprise! Our room was clean and had great housekeeping service.Nice varitey of food items offered at breakfast. Looking forward to our next stay. Thanks, Shirley and Stacey

Reviews.Title: “Awesome stay at this hotel.”
Reviews.Author: apttoleave
Reviews.Content: It had everything a more expensive hotel would have for less. I got my nice bedding, free WiFi, free breakfast and flat screen for much less than it would have been somewhere else. Nice off the main road location was very peaceful. Nice outdoor pool. Very friendly staff and very clean.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly and clean place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: Connie P
Reviews.Content: We had a little trouble finding this hotel, due to the fact I had not mapquested it. I had a map of Branson but the street the motel was on was not listed. Growing frustrated I called the motel, and a very nice man gave me instructions from the parking lot I was calling from and said if I had any trouble to call back. The motel sits off Branson's 76 Strip in a very quiet and tree-lined area called the Falls. I was very tired from the drive and went in and the receptionist was very friendly, smiling and found me a room where I would have no steps to climb. She explained to me the offerings they had for breakfast and said to call if I needed anything. The next morning we went to the dining area and it had several guests eating. The two servers were mother and daughter and very nice, friendly and attentive. Our room was spotless and picture perfect when we opened the door. The breakfast was great, with scrambled eggs, waffles, bagels, cereal, biscuits and gravy etc. All very fresh and clean. The a.m. desk clerk greeted me with a smile and a smll box of chocolates. My only complaint would be that the air conditioner didn't put out enough air, but that may just be me. Cleanest and friendliest place I have stayed. Being off the Strip was great too. No noise of traffic. They have two outside gazebos and a small pool also. The gazebos had flowers all over and were quite pretty. The price was very reasonable and I would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: atpawhc
Reviews.Content: Stayed here May 2 to May 9 for the best stay we have had in 4 visits in Branson.Very nice stay,great staff and beds. Thanks to all of the staff for making our vacation great. Thanks, Harry and Vivian

Reviews.Title: “Amazing accommodations-”
Reviews.Author: Debbie E
Reviews.Content: Travelled to Branson with two elderly moms--the hotel was spotless. The staff was helpful and courteous. The hot breakfast was great-waffles, biscuits/gravy, scrambled eggs, and other breakfast foods. We opted for the king room and the bed was very comfortable. The room was great with a loveseat and refrigerator and microwave. It was just like being home. For $70 a night for the king room-it was an awesome deal. It was a short distance from the main drag but just enough in the hills to be enjoyed. Loved it.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Choice”
Reviews.Author: TravelersKansas
Reviews.Content: You can't go wrong by staying at the Yellow Rose in Branson. VERY reasonably priced. Extremely clean and well-maintained. Good breakfast with a mom and daughter team taking care of your dining needs. Comfy beds, clean pool.

Reviews.Title: “Very good for the price paid”
Reviews.Author: theplayer19
Reviews.Content: This is a nice place with a nice staff. The grounds and room were neat and clean. The pillow top bed was comfortable. The breakfast was good for the price. Overall for the price paid this was a very good deal. It is off the strip but not hard to find. There is a large billboard sign telling you were to turn. I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “priced reasonable”
Reviews.Author: barbara m
Reviews.Content: This smaller motel has a great breakfast with lots of varieties of food. Everyone is very friendly. They have a large out door pool. It is a clean reasonable priced hotel off the main drag of Branson. We have stayed there many times. There is a sitting area for outside and a place to sit out by your room with an overhang. Looking for reasonable price and not too pricey this is it. the rooms are on ground level.

Reviews.Title: “Great price and Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: theresa j
Reviews.Content: The Yellow Rose is the best hotel I have stayed in at Branson. Every trip I make We stay at a different hotel but from now on I will stay at the Yellow Rose. We requested a room near the pool and we could sit in the room and watch the kids from our window. We did not hear any noise from the rooms next to us. The room colors were light and very calming. Breakfast was great and had many choices instead of just donuts. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful. Upon check in we were given popcorn and check out we were given a box of chocolate. The towels were big and thick instead of the thin ones most hotels have. I am already planning my next trip and will definitely be staying at the Yellow Rose

Reviews.Title: “Great and at an excellent price”
Reviews.Author: TMoose1957
Reviews.Content: The check in was smooth and the desk clerk was very helpful and efficient. The rooms were extremely clean and quiet. The price for the quality of the room was just unbelievable, it was such a wonderful bargain. The lady that took care of the breakfast was so helpful and friendly, the whole experience was very positive and when we go back to Branson, we will be staying here.

Reviews.Title: “Yellow Rose Gem”
Reviews.Author: Bert S
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay and so quiet. Friendly, efficient personnel. Would not change a thing. Very clean and we were quiet satisfied! Schoutens - Tulsa OK

Reviews.Title: “Only place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Aaron B
Reviews.Content: Just got back from a three night stay. Yellow Rose Inn had none of the typical motel feeling for me, it was more like home. Check in was quick and painless. Our suite was on the ground level with conveniently close parking available. The room was IMMACULATELY clean. I had no problems feeling comfortable immediately. The bed was amazing. The mini fridge and microwave were a huge plus since we like to bring a few things along. The complimentary breakfast was definitely leaps and bounds above the norm. The room was so quiet we completely slept through a storm that rolled through in the middle of one of our nights. I would highly recommend a stay here! Hard working people who absolutely understand the meaning of the hospitality industry and providing value and service to their customers.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Stay-Excellent Price”
Reviews.Author: Linda H
Reviews.Content: It is a nice motel that was clean and very friendly, they also had great waffles that were made for you in the breakfast area. The rooms were quiet and the walls were not paper thin--could not hear the neighboring rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Branson's Best Kept Secret!”
Reviews.Author: pwif43
Reviews.Content: Husband and I just spent the weekend in Branson, and have FINALLY found a hotel that we WILL be staying at every time we visit! The Branson Yellow Rose Inn and Suites is one of Branson's best kept secrets! There was a little snafu in our check-in, but was immediately corrected. Everything was smooth sailing from there. The staff was great, the rooms were very very clean, slept like a baby!!!! Breakfast was great! Upon our check out, we were given a small box of Russell Stover's Candy! :-) Would most definitely recommend this place!

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice!!!”
Reviews.Author: Gay B
Reviews.Content: My husband and I are very particular with regard to hotels. This Inn is quite a "find"! It was extremely clean, updated and quiet. Exactly what we needed for our weekend getaway. It is close to the Branson strip, yet far enough away that we did not have the noise or traffic. The breakfast was very good too. The staff was friendly and accomodating. Highly recommend!!!

Reviews.Title: “The best hotel I've ever stayed in!”
Reviews.Author: Cham515
Reviews.Content: My sister and I stayed at the Yellow Rose this last weekend, and had the best experience!I have stayed at many, many hotels in my life, and this is by far the best I have ever stayed in! The rooms were so clean, the bed was phenomenal, flat screen TV, fridge, and microwave. I could have just moved in for good! I was so leary because of the price, but read the reviews and thought I would give it a try, So glad I did. The grounds were just lovely, and the staff was so nice. And the kicker, we got a box of chocolates for each of us when we checked out! We joked that we could fit the mattresses on the top of the car when we left, didn't want to get out of the beds. I go down about once a year to visit family, and even if the family has room for me, I will probably decline and stay there instead. Close enough to attractions, but far enough away to be nice and quiet! Thank you for a great experience!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Linda M
Reviews.Content: I've just returned from a 3 night stay at the Branson, Mo. Yellow Rose Inn. It was very enjoyable. All personnel were so very friendly and accommodating. The room was clean and well maintained. The location was quiet but close to everything. Main roads were easy to find to get to entertainment, dining and shopping. I would definitely recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, quiet, comfortable place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: Tmc1947
Reviews.Content: My wife and I just returned from a three night stay at this hotel starting on April 28th. We enjoyed our stay very much. On arrival, we were able to upgrade our room to a King Suite. The room was fairly spacious and although the bathroom was a bit small it was adequate. The room was clean and well maintained each day. The bed was very comfortable and it was nice having the loveseat, fridge and microwave. There were also another chair and a nice office chair to go with the desk in the room. I thought a particular nice touch was a multiplug strip on the desk for plugging computer, phone chargers, etc. More hotels should include these in their rooms. The breakfast room was nice and there were two gazebos for outdoor eating and viewing. The breakfast was nice and the ladies working there very helpful. Although the hotel is off the main strip, it is easy to get to and near one of the main traffic routes. For us, being a little isolated was alright as it made the hotel very quiet and restful. All in all, it was a nice trip and we look forward to staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it! WIll stay again.”
Reviews.Author: Lynn_Dixi
Reviews.Content: We went for just a short getaway and stayed at the Yellow Rose. It's tucked away off the main roads, but still just minutes from theaters/attractions. Very quiet and peaceful and safe. Rooms were clean and neat and recently updated. Comfy pillow top mattresses, fridge/microwave in the rooms. Delightful little breakfast area and the attendants were friendly and helpful. They served a full breakfast with fruit, juices, coffee, cereals, pastries, waffles, scrambled eggs, biscuits/gravy. What more could you need to start the day?

Reviews.Title: “Great weekend”
Reviews.Author: Marilyn H
Reviews.Content: Just wanted to write my first review for Branson Yellow Rose Inn and Suites. We were thrilled to find a beautiful room that look as if it been remodeled with new bedding, paint and updated TV, microwave and refreg. The king size pillow-top bed was so comfortable it was like being home in my own bed. The location is not far from the 76 strip. To top it off when we went for breakfast the next morning we found so much waiting for us...biscuits, gravy, eggs, waffles, bagles, cereals to name a few of the items. We were greeted by two ladies who seated us and offered to make waffles for us. They made us feel so special but we noticed that this kind treatment was given to each person arriving. The breakfast area was nice and clean. We have been going to Branson for many years but we have now found our home away from home.

Reviews.Title: “Made a Fun Trip Even Better!”
Reviews.Author: Charles S
Reviews.Content: My wife and I both enjoyed our stay a great deal! The room was very clean, very quiet and the pillow top bed was nice and comfortable. The staff was outstanding! I have never experienced a more friendly, helpful group of people in any previous trip to other places. They have a nice breakfast to start the day. Thank you, Irene and Erica! Mary Alice and Jake were on the desk and they were very helpful. The maids, Diann and Michelle were nice and helpful and very friendly. They do an outstanding job on the rooms! I am a people person and these are some great people to brighten your traveling experience. I just don't know what more we could have asked for! AND the price was right!

Reviews.Title: “Friendly”
Reviews.Author: Keri99
Reviews.Content: This hotel is by far the friendliest place we have ever stayed in Branson, and that is saying alot since Branson is overall a very friendly community! The room was very clean and had everything it promised. Bed was very soft. The mother and daughter who run the breakfast area were just as nice and cheerful as could be. We are planning on coming back later in the summer and will for sure stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Experience”
Reviews.Author: madge82
Reviews.Content: This is the third time I have stayed in this motel. It is simply the cleanest, nicest, motel ever. I have stayed in othercountries as well as other cities. I have never found one better or more professional than this Yellow Rose. The management as well as the clerks, housekeeping etc was super. They are consistent with everything. The rooms are extra clean. The breakfast is nice and servers excellent. I will return in May to this motel.

Reviews.Title: “unreal clean and great service”
Reviews.Author: jim t
Reviews.Content: WE have stayed in branson plenty of times and always paid big money. We have stayed in motels from coast to coast ,We must tell you that we found yellow rose the cleanest and most friendly. you can not find this anywhere, unbeleivable rates.do not miss a stay there if your wanting to go to branson.make sure you have the breakfast food very good and the service was second to none. JIM and SANDY THOMAS from crown point indiana

Reviews.Title: “Wow! What a great place!”
Reviews.Author: tessiebear
Reviews.Content: VERY clean room, quiet, and bed was wonderful..great night's rest. Stayed 3 nights. Will definitely stay here again. Lady at breakfast was very helpful, making guests waffles and keeping room clean and items stocked. You won't be disappointed, room rates are another plus.

Reviews.Title: “Just a stop to look around”
Reviews.Author: cj725
Reviews.Content: We wanted to get a look at Branson so we found the Yellow Rose for $55 It was clean. Difficult to get an internet connection from where we were in the building.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: ydbgrandrapids
Reviews.Content: We stayed the first week of April. The people at the front desk were really helpful and went out of their way to help us find good places to eat and shows.They were like good friends. The ladies in the breakfast area were also really friendly. The rooms were large and very clean. Rates went down when we were here and they were nice enough to give us the lower rate. TV was great. Nice quiet location. We would stay again for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Favorite Branson Lodging”
Reviews.Author: kbake00y
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have stayed twice in the past month at this Inn. It is one of the best places we have stayed on any of our trips, The staff is always friendly and helpful. The rooms are quiet and nicely decorated.The breakfast is more than ample and you can always find something to your liking. Thank you for a wonderful place to stay to relieve the stress of the world. WE WILL BE BACK very soon. Kevan and Debra Baker

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic deal in Branson!!”
Reviews.Author: Mindyelaine43
Reviews.Content: We found this place on tripadvisor and we were very impressed with the cleanliness and great value! The rooms are very clean and comfortable. The breakfast is very nice, although the coffee could be better. The staff are friendly and helpful. The rooms are outside entry but they do have a nice security system and it is in a quiet neighborhood away from the main strip. It's a little hidden but well worth finding

Reviews.Title: “Very enjoyable visit!”
Reviews.Author: Tonya3004
Reviews.Content: My husband & I really enjoyed our stay at this inn. The inn was very very clean. We were amazed at how quite it was there. The pillow top bed was wonderful and very comfortable. We slept great. The room was decorated very cheerfully. The tv in the room was high def. with HBO. At breakfast we had no problem getting waited on. The lady assisting with breakfast cooked waffles for us and was very nice to us. The breakfast consisted of scrambled eggs, biscuits and gravy, chilled fruit, donuts, cereal, toast, selection of jelly, juice and coffee. The price was awesome! The innkeeper will also get your show tickets for you if needed, with advance notice. The only negative I can think of was the coffee maker in the room only made about 1 1/2 cups of coffee and the inn was a little difficult to find. Overall, we really liked this place and we will definitely go back.

Reviews.Title: “Still Geat”
Reviews.Author: nexttime2
Reviews.Content: I visited Branson last year and stayed at the Yellow Rose. It appeared to have been recently updated and was great. I stayed there again this year and was pleased to see that it was still being operated at the same high level. I have stayed at various hotels in Branson over the years and have found that for many, the level of quality goes up and down over time. I am very pleased to see that that is not the case with the Yellow Rose.

Reviews.Title: “ok--could be better....”
Reviews.Author: annevt30
Reviews.Content: Thank goodness we received a discounted rate otherwise this hotel is too overpriced for being #2 on trip advisor! Very disappointed; I expected more  Decided to stay here since the reviews were so positive. Unfortunately, our 3 night visit was ok…. We’ve stayed at better hotels in Branson for the price & this one was really average! The only thing we enjoyed was the breakfast lady who always smiled, made excellent waffles & kept the breakfast area clean. Otherwise, you are better off staying at another hotel. First, this hotel is hard to get to….lack of signs coming from the strip & we missed our right turn every time! It’s in the back or in between some timeshares & hard to get to at night. Too far from the strip & shows! Second, the room was small- even though it had 2 queen beds. The “up-dated” room may have had new carpet & bedspreads but the mattress was uncomfortable. Bathroom is tiny! The shower was terrible & old. You had to lift up the spout & half the water wasn’t coming out of the showerhead. The water kept switching from cold to hot every 2 seconds; you can hear the ‘hissing’ noise from the shower! Our “mountain view” room in the back of the hotel faced an open parking lot directly across from a maintenance shop. So much for keeping your windows open! The hotel itself was very quiet but you could still hear people from the other rooms. The frig & microwave was a plus although the 1-cup coffee maker really needs to be replaced! It only makes a ½ cup of coffee & only 2 packs per room. The breakfast was all prepackaged! No fresh juice or fresh fruit (only watered down & canned); no yogurt or any healthy choices available. The highlight was asking the front desk for a tube of toothpaste since we forgotten ours; they didn’t have any!! No shower cap & a tiny bottle of shampoo. The amenities that you take for granted at any other hotel were not at this one! Cheap! Overall, the hotel was ok…but our 4 days in Branson were fun despite the rain. I would not stay at this place again. For a family ( babies to teens) you are better off staying at the Grand Country water park (grandcountry.com). This one is even better than castle rock! You can walk to the buffets, play games & eat pizza at the Fun Spot and watch a pretty good show (grand jubilee) even if you don’t like country music. Avoid the traffic and take the Yellow/blue/red routes.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic beds, clean room with all amenities, Excellent breakfast!”
Reviews.Author: KarenN777
Reviews.Content: Great little place for a great price ($49 a night with the special they had going)! We will be going back soon. I am a germaphobe. This was the best room I've ever rented, and I have traveled plenty. I didn't have to disinfect anything but the doorknobs and the toilet, (which actually looked clean already, but I have this thing.) Bed was super comfy (Slept better than at home, I want one). TV was huge, frig, HBO, internet, lots of towels. Irene in the continental breakfast room was a real go-getter. Everything you could want in a free continental breakfast. LOVED IT! Didn't want to leave! Kari and Bruno offer many thanks to the lovely Manager and the friendly staff! And we had a blast at the karaoke/live music bar under Dick Clark's American Bandstand Restaurant that opens at 5 or 6 pm and starts karaoke right away, every day, and up until the band starts at 11P on band nights. Very reasonably priced drinks and lots of fun!

Reviews.Title: “Clean room, nice beds”
Reviews.Author: HawkeyeTourist
Reviews.Content: Room was clean, the pillow top beds were very comfortable, staff was very helpful in obtaining tickets for attractions. Nice tv and good breakfast. Bathroom a little on the small side. It was in a good location for us. Flat parking lot was nice in this hilly town. Tough to beat the price. Looks like they are adding an elevator.

Reviews.Title: “Great secluded place”
Reviews.Author: Heidi B
Reviews.Content: This was a great place to stay in Branson. It was off the main strip which was nice and quiet. The people are friendly and service was great. There was a fridge, microwave , hair dryer, Huge flat screen tv, and desk...great perks. Breakfast was very good, lots of variety.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place Great Price”
Reviews.Author: Me0727
Reviews.Content: We had a great visit to Branson and loved the yellow rose. It was very very clean, great staff and it was a great price. You can tell that they did some recent remoding new bedding dressers and a huge flat screen t.v. We even found a coupon in the Travel Buddy and it was like $54.00 a night. Inculdes a hot breakfast with biscuits and gravy or they will make you a waffel donuts cereal etc. The breakfast area was a little small but we got a seat pretty fast and it was all fine. The only other negative thing I have to say is we stayed on the 3rd floor and there was not an elevator so it was a little hard to get all of our luggage and we bring a cooler up all the stairs but again all the good out weighs the bad and we will defently stay here again. As a matter of fact we have a reservation coming up in June. Give the Yellow Rose and try and I bet you will want to stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service, above and beyond, Very reasonable rate, Friendly people, Very clean, Excellent breakfast better than”
Reviews.Author: Jerretta S
Reviews.Content: Very friendly, clean they went above and beyond, The breakfast was fantastic, way better than continental. Very clean brand new rooms. Completely remodeled. very affordable. And excellent staff.

Reviews.Title: “would stay again”
Reviews.Author: Bob K
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very clean and the beds were comfortable. The large flat screen TV was very nice. The staff was very helpful and courteous.

Reviews.Title: “Relaxing hotel with yummy breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Bigjayhawkfan
Reviews.Content: For a budget hotel this place is amazing! Great food for breakfast and nice staff working here. The beds were pretty comfy (shocking for a budget hotel). We didn't notice any noises outside our room from loud guests (which is a HUGE problem at most Branson hotels regretfully). Pool is only outdoors, which limits this place to only working for my family to the summers. Nice that this hotel is off the beaten path, but easy access to many places. Will stay here again for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to vacation at. Will come back next year.”
Reviews.Author: vada61
Reviews.Content: We got back yesterday from our trip to Branson. Myself, my boyfriend and his mother and aunt. We enjoyed this hotel very much. The room decor was very pretty and clean. The beds were most comfortable. The breakfast that was provided was very tasty and their was enough food to feed an army. They served scrambled eggs, fruit, biscuits and gravy, juices, coffee, cereal, doughnuts, bagels and waffles. The women staffing the kitchen area even made my waffle for me and they stayed to chat with us. The only downfall is that the dining area is a little small when the rush showed up, but from what I understand is that this is under new management and they are going to be doing a lot of upgrading for the next year. Maybe next time we come back you might have cranberry juice on the menu(hint-hint)..lol Thank you very much for an enjoyable stay we we will definately be back. Janet, Bruce, Marlys and Sharon

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Winnipeg_gal_11
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 4 nights late November and I have to say that I had not a single complaint. The king size bed was heavenly, the room was spotless and staff was wonderful. We had the continental breakfast each day and the dining room and staff was just great. Just one suggestion - change the brand of the canned breakfast fruit (some other brands are more tasty!) We will definately stay there again next visit.

Reviews.Title: “Good Exerience”
Reviews.Author: nexttime2
Reviews.Content: My wife and I sepnt two nights at the Yellow Rose and were very pleased with all aspects of the stay. It appears to have been updated very recently and is in great shape. The room was clean and looked very nice. The beds were really great. The front desk folks were very efficient and friendly.The location is a little off the beaten path, which turned out to be a benifit. Getting into and out of the parking lot was much easier than at a hotel on the strip. The free breakfast was good and more than competitive with other hotels. The rates were very reasonable. We will definately stay here on our next trip to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: djoyce05
Reviews.Content: I come to Branson all the time. I found a new place to stay. I had no problems at all with this hotel. The only thing was the rowdy kids next door. But that was out of their hands. I have told all my friends about this place and hope everybody will give them a chance!

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: JimGowen_MI
Reviews.Content: Everything about the Yellow Rose Inn is positive---from the friendly staff and the great breakfast, to the clean and comfortable room-all for a reasonable price. It is off the main strip so traffic and noise is no problem. It is easily accessible by the Yellow Route but not visible from Hwy 165 so watch for the sign. We will stay there again when we visit Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Very Good - for a motel”
Reviews.Author: ldepp
Reviews.Content: Our party of eight stayed 3 nights in early December. Quiet location about a mile from Hwy 76. Friendly people. Very clean and comfortable rooms. The beds (Denver Mattress) were excellent and all of us slept well. Not a fan of the decor - ours was pink/purple with a pepto-bismol pink bathroom. The TV channels were strange - 2 channels for each station. One station was non-HD and the other HD. Some HD channels did not receive the signal very well and had frequent skips in the video/audio. Hot breakfast was very good. A young lady made all the waffles to order. Value is excellent. However this is a MOTEL so expect the usual motel noise with people passing by your room.

Reviews.Title: “Need sheets that fit the bed.”
Reviews.Author: nansam1
Reviews.Content: The first impression of this hotel was great - the decor was beautiful and the room smelled so clean. We had a King Suite and the bed was a pillow-top - but that's the problem. The mattress pad, which was also pillow top and the bottom sheet would not stay on the bed. With every turn and movement, the pad and sheet came up and we would end up on bare mattress with the pad and sheet in a bunch. As you can imagine, that is not a pleasant thought - wondering who else had slept on that bare mattress. Had a very difficult time sleeping both nights. We were with another couple who was in the room next door and they had the same problem. They had a very nice breakfast, which was free to guests, but the room where they had tables and chairs was way too small for the number of people who tried to get breakfast there. If you waited very long after nine o'clock, the line for a table was out the door. We looked at reviews on trip advisor before we chose this hotel and have a hard time beleiving that no one else had the 'bed' problem.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Country_Traveler2011
Reviews.Content: Yellow Rose was a nice hotel. Breakfast was a little disapointing as there was no meat, but plenty of other choices. It also is a little hard to find. Be sure to have a good map or GPS.

Reviews.Title: “Hard to climb stairs, but good overall value.”
Reviews.Author: Grannybird4
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed the comfortable bed, and clean room.The staff overall was most helpful, especially Irene and her daughter at breakfast. Quiet location, a little difficult to find, but overall a good experience. We found it difficult to navigate the stairs as there is no elevator, and we had to climb two flights of stairs with baggage for a week.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel, just need larger dining room!”
Reviews.Author: Norma J
Reviews.Content: The Hotel was wonderful. I wish there was smoking rooms available but at least having an outside entrance and exit helped. We could smoke directly outside our door instead of exiting to a hallway and having to walk downstairs and then outside to smoke. The breakfast was very good and the personnel was extremely helpful and very friendly. I certainly would hope that this dining area could be enlarged extremely so people would have plenty of tables to go to directly to sit down. The personnel did everything in their power to seat everyone as quickly as possible. Also for people who need it, it would be nice to have sugar free syrup for their waffles. It would also be nice to have pancakes on the menu and some sausage links or bacon to choose from. Also the eggs could have some cheese and green and red peppers for flavoring. The main thing is to just enlarge it extremely. Having a large dining room will keep people from having to go out to restaurants to eat breakfast. Flavored coffee and coffee creamers would also be nice. I am used to drinking flavored cappachino but I made do. We will definitely come back as soon as possible.

Reviews.Title: “Branson Vacation”
Reviews.Author: Garry G
Reviews.Content: We stayed a full week at the Yellow Rose and they made it a wonderful week. All the folks there were very helpful and super nice from the front desk, maids, and the breakfast crew. It is located close to Branson but far enough out that is is a very quiet and peaceful. The breakfast was a full breakfast, not just donuts and coffee. The room was always clean and the beds were very comfortable. My wife and I will stay here the next time we go to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent local hotel”
Reviews.Author: BJL83
Reviews.Content: This hotel has been updated and remodeled. It was VERY nice, comfortable and quiet. Breakfast was nice, with a good variety (complete with an attendant who kept things stocked as needed). We had no idea where to stay and was lucky to find this hotel on Trip Advisor. We were NOT disappointed at all. Staff is very accommodating at check-in and with show tickets. If you need a clean comfortable and AFFORDABLE room, check this place out. It will be on our list the next time we are in Branson and need a hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great location off the strip with quiet rooms!”
Reviews.Author: BGDUDE
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this location for 3 nights in November in a King Suite. We arrived late but had no problem finding this location after dark. It is perfectly placed so you can access it from more than one direction and avoid almost any traffic. The room was very clean and the beds were firm and comfy. The parking was plentiful and the breakfast was well attended by staff members. We would definitely recommend this location for an extended stay in Branson!

Reviews.Title: “A Great Stay at Branson”
Reviews.Author: Bob H
Reviews.Content: We, my wife and I went to Branson in late October 2011 for a getaway from home. I tried to do my homework before leaving and found the Yellow Rose Inn and Suites. We had a wonderful time in Branson and were very well pleased with the Yellow Rose. The accomodations were new, clean, well attended and comfortable. There was a pillow top on our bed which made it extra comfortable. The price was right as well. The breakfast room was well attended by a mother and her adult daughter who made everything easy for you, including even making waffles for you. My only complaint was no fruit. My hat is off to all of the staff, The general manager and the owner M. D. Weill.

Reviews.Title: “Found a Gem!”
Reviews.Author: jwoge
Reviews.Content: We usually stay out at Emerald Pointe but for quick trips (1-2 nights) we tend to find a place in town. In the past we have stayed at other motels in Branson but we tend to go back to our chain favorites since none of these other motels (although good) have the amenities we enjoy. We were a bit disappointed to find our #1 & #2 choices booked. After reading the reviews on Yellow Rose we decided to give it a try. I am pleased to report that the reviews here are very accurate. The motel is off the beaten path of 76, which is a very good thing. Our king suite was comfortable and more important, immaculate. The folks in the office are very pleasant and helpful. The breakfast was more than "continental" with offerings like waffles, eggs, cereals, pastries. All in all we enjoyed our stay and would go back. The only downside is they don't accept pets for those who travel with their extended familiy.

Reviews.Title: “Branson Visitor”
Reviews.Author: Dennis S
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Branson Yellow Rose Inn & Suites was a great value. Our room was very clean and quite. The staff was great and very helpful in getting us show tickets on short notice. Can't forget to mention the free breakfast every morning (includes waffles and biscuits & gravy).

Reviews.Title: “Very nice,clean”
Reviews.Author: travelinmimi
Reviews.Content: I and some of my family stayed at the Yellow Rose Inn 2 days ago and found it to be very clean and comfortable and an excellent value.The beds and pillows were every bit as comfortable as those at a Marriot that I recently stayed at.The breakfast was very good with a good variety and a staff member who even makes the waffles and serves them.I would highly recommend this motel.

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay with one caveat”
Reviews.Author: tonka11_99
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at the "Yellow Rose" and it was very nice. It was recently renovated. There was a nice looking pool. They even serve a free breakfast with waffles and eggs albeit hard boiled eggs. They are off the main drag which, trust me is an advantage. It gets very busy on that main drag. The "Yellow Rose is also very inexpensive. Our room had a small refrigerator with a freezer section (handy for freezing cold packs for coolers), a microwave and a coffee maker. All in all, I would highly recommend the Yellow Rose. I have one caveat. If you need a ground floor room because of mobility issues, you may want to consider another place, You have to walk up about 8 stair steps from the parking lot and there is no elevator. My wife has C.O.P.D. and back problems so it was difficult for her.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel and bistro”
Reviews.Author: Sherla M
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Yellow Rose for six nights and had a wonderful experience. The rooms were clean, well appointed and very quiet. The housekeeping staff is top notch and did a great job cleaning the room each day. The Inn also has a bistro that serves a complimentary breakfast. Breakfast includes freshly made waffles, fresh pastries, hot and cold cereals, toast, juice and coffee. The bistro is run by a mother/daughter team who are about the sweetest two people you would ever want to meet. We will be staying again at the Yellow Rose. You should too! You won't be disappointed!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Dorothy T
Reviews.Content: We went to Branson for two nights. First night stayed at Howard Johnsons and was not pleased at all. Checked out the next day and I had seen the sign to Yellow Rose the day before so we decided to check it out. We ask the desk clerk if we could see the room because we just had a bad experience the night before with a bad room. She was very nice took us to see the room and it was a king bed with a very nice comforter the room was very clean. The room we stayed in the night before was more expensive and it didn't have nothing but a little coffee maker. The room at Yellow Rose had a microwave, fridge and coffee maker. The bed was so comfortable and one of the most important things the room was so clean. Had a very nice clean pool and a nice gazeboo with wicker furniture. My husband I sat out there to eat our breakfast. The staff was very friendly. We will definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “What a wonderful hotel! The rooms are Super Clean!!!”
Reviews.Author: Sue H
Reviews.Content: We came down from Kansas City to Branson for a business seminar and were SO pleased with our stay. The hotel staff was very friendly and helpful! And our room was perfectly clean! We felt very comfortable there! If we come to Branson again - we definitely will come back and stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Spotless and Quuiet”
Reviews.Author: Travel501
Reviews.Content: We stayed here two nights. Bedding, carpet, furniture all new. Sink/bath spotless. Front desk very friendly and very apologetic: If you arrive after 10pm have them recode your room key or you'll have to make a trip back to the office like we did. Something about the lock resetting if not used before 10pm. Only downer was the continental breakfast area. Offerings are OK, but the area seats perhaps 20 or so, and getting to the food through the tightly packed seating is a chore. We went down the street to Uptown Cafe- $5.99 buffet- very good. The Yellow Rose is easy to get to, in a quiet spot. We'll definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice room”
Reviews.Author: sunshine0046
Reviews.Content: We only stayed one night at the Yellow Rose Inn and will definitely stay again. We found the room to be very clean, the beds very comfortable and having a refrigerator in the room is a big plus. The towels were thick and fluffy. Also I appreciated the desk and comfortable chair for working on the computer. The motel is in a quiet setting and the staff was very friendly. The only thing keeping me from giving this motel a 5 rating is that the young man I spoke to on the phone didn't tell me the coupon I had wasn't good for the walk-in level rooms, only the upper floor. The girl apologized the next morning about the mistake. It is still a very good value for the room and we will be glad to stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “This was a very pleasant surprise!”
Reviews.Author: shiningspark49
Reviews.Content: We only stayed one night but would definitely stay again. The rooms were clean & fresh. The linens, including the bedspreads and towels were like new AND best of all the mattresses were extremely comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “A very comfortable hotel at a reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: PBSpeakeasy
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a 3 nite stay at the Yellow Rose Inn in Branson. This hotel was an excellent value. We are a 50ish couple who don't really want to be in the center of the action, but want to be close enough to get there easily, and this place was perfect for us. It is quiet, the beds are super comfortable, the room and hotel were clean and well maintained, and it includes a continental breakfast. The price was reasonable for Branson, and we saved $10.00 per nite with a coupon we printed off Trip Advisor. The hotel is located off the beaten path in a quiet area, but is just a couple of blocks from Hwy. 165, one of the major arteries in Branson, and it is about a quarter of a mile from Green Mountain Drive, one of the traffic relief alternatives. If you have been to Branson, you know about the traffic at all times of the day and night, so this location was really handy. The room includes a fridge, microwave and one cup coffee maker. The only thing that was disappointing is that the shower, while clean, had very low water pressure. It took a long time to shower just because the water came out so slowly. The breakfast had the usual stuff--waffles, bagels, cereal, toast, donuts, milk, juice, and coffee. All in all, this was an excellent choice.

Reviews.Title: “Quiet, friendly, very nice stay”
Reviews.Author: Keith R
Reviews.Content: Staying Oct 7-8, 2011. Room renovations are great. Excellent decor and bed is very comfortable. Great location, out of the main traffic but very close to everything. Extremely quiet. Hotel staff is very friendly and helpful. Great breakfast. I have recommended to my parents and children already. Will stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT CHOICE”
Reviews.Author: Derrek B
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 4 nights. And enjoyed every minute. Although most people come to Branson NOT to stay in the hotel/room, but to get out and see every show and shop available. The location and beauty of this place is just wonderful. I/we wish our schedule wasn't so full ! We could have experienced GOD's wonders more. The ladies in the breakfast area were AWESOME!!!! You didn't have to ask for assistance; they were asking to assist you. GREAT JOB by Nancy (the manager) on assembling a WINNING TEAM. This will be our #1 choice on our return visits.

Reviews.Title: “Will stay again”
Reviews.Author: M1ke22
Reviews.Content: This was our first time at the Yellow Rose and it was a very good stay. The rooms are very clean and the beds are very comfortable. The ladies in the breakfast were very helpful and very willing to meet our needs. It was a very quite motel off the strip which was great for us. The one and only fault that I could find was the shower was a little low for me. For the majority of the people it would be just fine. Plan on staying there when we come for the Christmas shows. I loved the large 40in. TV in the room as we were able to watch the football game before we went and saw the amazing TEXAS TENORS.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Quality and Service....Excellent!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: S M
Reviews.Content: I usually stay at one of the motel or hotels on the strip... This place is off the strip and 165 is a few blocks over.. I stayed here for 5 nights and it was an excellent choice.. The place has been recently remodeled in May and the breakfast attendants were the best. I have never stayed at a place where the breakfast attendant made your waffle and brought it to you..
